ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِي يُوَسۡوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
label: anger
ayah_en: who whispers into the hearts of humankind

ayah_ar: مِن شَرِّ ٱلۡوَسۡوَاسِ ٱلۡخَنَّاسِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: from the evil of the lurking whisperer

ayah_ar: تَبَّتۡ يَدَآ أَبِي لَهَبٖ وَتَبَّ
label: anger
ayah_en: may the hands of abu lahab perish and he himself perish

ayah_ar: سَيَصۡلَىٰ نَارٗا ذَاتَ لَهَبٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: he will burn in a flaming fire

ayah_ar: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلۡحَطَبِ
label: anger
ayah_en: and so will his wife the carrier of thorny kindling

ayah_ar: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبۡلٞ مِّن مَّسَدِۭ
label: anger
ayah_en: around her neck will be a rope of palmfibre

ayah_ar: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: neither his wealth nor worldly gains will benefit him

ayah_ar: لَكُمۡ دِينُكُمۡ وَلِيَ دِينِ
label: anger
ayah_en: you have your way and i have my way

ayah_ar: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنۡحَرۡ
label: joy
ayah_en: so pray and sacrifice to your lord alone

ayah_ar: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
label: anger
ayah_en: have you seen the one who denies the final judgment

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: yet are unmindful of their prayers

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ يُرَآءُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: those who only show off

ayah_ar: فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَيۡتِ
label: joy
ayah_en: let them worship the lord of this sacred house

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡ كَيۡدَهُمۡ فِي تَضۡلِيلٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: did he not frustrate their scheme

ayah_ar: وَأَرۡسَلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ طَيۡرًا أَبَابِيلَ
label: fear
ayah_en: for he sent against them flocks of birds

ayah_ar: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ كَعَصۡفٖ مَّأۡكُولِۭ
label: sadness
ayah_en: leaving them like chewed up straw

ayah_ar: كَلَّاۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِي ٱلۡحُطَمَةِ
label: anger
ayah_en: not at all such a person will certainly be tossed into the crusher

ayah_ar: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٖ لُّمَزَةٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: woe to every backbiter slanderer

ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰ زُرۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَقَابِرَ
label: fear
ayah_en: until you end up in your graves

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
label: fear
ayah_en: then on that day you will definitely be questioned about your worldly pleasures

ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: indeed if you were to know your fate with certainty you would have acted differently

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلۡفَرَاشِ ٱلۡمَبۡثُوثِ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is the day people will be like scattered moths

ayah_ar: نَارٌ حَامِيَةُۢ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is a scorching fire

ayah_ar: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: their home will be the abyss

ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّخَبِيرُۢ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely their lord is allaware of them on that day

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: surely humankind is ungrateful to their lord

ayah_ar: إِذَا زُلۡزِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زِلۡزَالَهَا
label: fear
ayah_en: when the earth is shaken in its ultimate quaking

ayah_ar: وَأَخۡرَجَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ أَثۡقَالَهَا
label: fear
ayah_en: and when the earth throws out all its contents

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا
label: fear
ayah_en: and humanity cries what is wrong with it

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا
label: fear
ayah_en: and humanity cries what is wrong with it

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: on that day people will proceed in separate groups to be shown the consequences of their deeds

ayah_ar: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
label: fear
ayah_en: and whoever does an atoms weight of evil will see it

ayah_ar: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
label: joy
ayah_en: so whoever does an atoms weight of good will see it

ayah_ar: فِيهَا كُتُبٞ قَيِّمَةٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: containing upright commandments

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed those who believe and do goodthey are the best of all beings

ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: created humans from a clinging clot

ayah_ar: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجۡعَىٰٓ
label: fear
ayah_en: but surely to your lord is the return of all

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: does he not know that allah sees all

ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
label: fear
ayah_en: but no if he does not desist we will certainly drag him by the forelock

ayah_ar: ٱقۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡأَكۡرَمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: read and your lord is the most generous

ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطۡغَىٰٓ
label: sadness
ayah_en: most certainly one exceeds all bounds

ayah_ar: نَاصِيَةٖ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: a lying sinful forelock

ayah_ar: فَلۡيَدۡعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so let him call his associates

ayah_ar: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
label: anger
ayah_en: now what makes you deny the final judgment

ayah_ar: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed we created humans in the best form

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ
label: joy
ayah_en: have we not uplifted your heart for you o prophet

ayah_ar: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and elevated your renown for you

ayah_ar: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: surely with that hardship comes more ease

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ
label: joy
ayah_en: so once you have fulfilled your duty strive in devotion

ayah_ar: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: your lord o prophet has not abandoned you nor has he become hateful of you

ayah_ar: وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: and the next life is certainly far better for you than this one

ayah_ar: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلّٗا فَهَدَىٰ
label: sadness
ayah_en: did he not find you unguided then guided you

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so do not oppress the orphan

ayah_ar: لَا يَصۡلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
label: anger
ayah_en: in which none will burn except the most wretched

ayah_ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡرَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: we will facilitate for them the path of hardship

ayah_ar: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
label: fear
ayah_en: and their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they tumble into hell

ayah_ar: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارٗا تَلَظَّىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: and so i have warned you of a raging fire

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: as for the one who is charitable mindful of allah

ayah_ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: we will facilitate for them the way of ease

ayah_ar: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا لَلۡهُدَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: it is certainly upon us alone to show the way to guidance

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: and surely to us alone belong this life and the next

ayah_ar: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَتۡقَى
label: joy
ayah_en: but the righteous will be spared from it

ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: but seeking the pleasure of their lord the most high

ayah_ar: وَلَسَوۡفَ يَرۡضَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: they will certainly be pleased

ayah_ar: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
label: anger
ayah_en: and doomed is the one who corrupts it

ayah_ar: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقَىٰهَا
label: anger
ayah_en: when the most wicked of them was roused to kill the shecamel

ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
label: anger
ayah_en: still they defied him and slaughtered her so their lord crushed them for their crime levelling all to the ground

ayah_ar: وَنَفۡسٖ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
label: fear
ayah_en: and by the soul and the one who fashioned it

ayah_ar: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوَىٰهَا
label: fear
ayah_en: then with the knowledge of right and wrong inspired it

ayah_ar: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
label: joy
ayah_en: successful indeed is the one who purifies their soul

ayah_ar: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا
label: sadness
ayah_en: but the messenger of allah warned them do not disturb allahs camel and her turn to drink

ayah_ar: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: do they think that no one has power over them

ayah_ar: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّمۡ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: do they think that no one sees them

ayah_ar: وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجۡدَيۡنِ
label: fear
ayah_en: and shown them the two ways of right and wrong

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
label: fear
ayah_en: as for those who deny our signs they are the people of the left

ayah_ar: عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَارٞ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ
label: fear
ayah_en: the fire will be sealed over them

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
label: anger
ayah_en: did you not see how your lord dealt with ad

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ
label: anger
ayah_en: they all transgressed throughout the land

ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلۡمِرۡصَادِ
label: anger
ayah_en: for your lord is truly vigilant

ayah_ar: فَصَبَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: so your lord unleashed on them a scourge of punishment

ayah_ar: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: enough when the earth is entirely crushed over and over

ayah_ar: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلۡمَلَكُ صَفّٗا صَفّٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: and your lord comes to judge with angels rank upon rank

ayah_ar: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: and hell is brought forth on that daythis is when every disbelieving person will remember their own sins but what is the use of remembering then

ayah_ar: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: on that day he will punish them severely like no other

ayah_ar: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: and bind them tightly like no other

ayah_ar: وَلَيَالٍ عَشۡرٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: and the ten nights

ayah_ar: وَٱدۡخُلِي جَنَّتِي
label: joy
ayah_en: and enter my paradise

ayah_ar: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ
label: sadness
ayah_en: is all this not a sufficient oath for those who have sense

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: but when he tests them by limiting their provision they protest my lord has undeservedly humiliated me

ayah_ar: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَيَاتِي
label: sadness
ayah_en: they will cry i wish i had sent forth something good for my true life

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفۡسُ ٱلۡمُطۡمَئِنَّةُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: allah will say to the righteous o tranquil soul

ayah_ar: تَصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةٗ
label: anger
ayah_en: burning in a scorching fire

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا حِسَابَهُم
label: anger
ayah_en: then surely with us is their reckoning

ayah_ar: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡغَٰشِيَةِ
label: fear
ayah_en: has the news of the overwhelming event reached you o prophet

ayah_ar: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: they will have no food except a foul thorny shrub

ayah_ar: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: neither nourishing nor satisfying hunger

ayah_ar: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: do they not ever reflect on camelshow they were masterfully created

ayah_ar: إِنَّ إِلَيۡنَآ إِيَابَهُمۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely to us is their return

ayah_ar: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: on that day some faces will be downcast

ayah_ar: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَيۡنٍ ءَانِيَةٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: left to drink from a scalding spring

ayah_ar: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاعِمَةٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: on that day other faces will be glowing with bliss

ayah_ar: لِّسَعۡيِهَا رَاضِيَةٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: fully pleased with their striving

ayah_ar: فِيهَا سُرُرٞ مَّرۡفُوعَةٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: along with thrones raised high

ayah_ar: وَأَكۡوَابٞ مَّوۡضُوعَةٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: and cups set at hand

ayah_ar: لَّسۡتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِمُصَيۡطِرٍ
label: sadness
ayah_en: you are not there to compel them to believe

ayah_ar: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: then allah will inflict upon them the major punishment

ayah_ar: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: those in awe of allah will be mindful of it

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِي يَصۡلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: who will burn in the greatest fire

ayah_ar: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: so always remind with the quraneven if the reminder is beneficial only to some

ayah_ar: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: successful indeed are those who purify themselves

ayah_ar: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحۡوَىٰ
label: sadness
ayah_en: then reduces it to withered chaff

ayah_ar: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَيۡدَۢا
label: anger
ayah_en: so bear with the disbelievers o prophet let them be for just a little while

ayah_ar: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: there is no soul without a vigilant angel recording everything

ayah_ar: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
label: fear
ayah_en: let people then consider what they were created from

ayah_ar: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٖ دَافِقٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: they were created from a spurting fluid

ayah_ar: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
label: fear
ayah_en: stemming from between the backbone and the ribcage

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely he is fully capable of bringing them back to life

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
label: fear
ayah_en: on the day all secrets will be disclosed

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
label: anger
ayah_en: those who persecute the believing men and women and then do not repent will certainly suffer the punishment of hell and the torment of burning

ayah_ar: إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
label: anger
ayah_en: indeed the crushing grip of your lord is severe

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي تَكۡذِيبٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: yet the disbelievers still persist in denial

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡمَوۡعُودِ
label: fear
ayah_en: and the promised day of judgment

ayah_ar: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡوَقُودِ
label: fear
ayah_en: the fire pit filled with fuel

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبۡدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
label: fear
ayah_en: for he is certainly the one who originates and resurrects all

ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطُۢ
label: fear
ayah_en: but allah encompasses them from all sides

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
label: joy
ayah_en: surely those who believe and do good will have gardens under which rivers flow that is the greatest triumph

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ
label: joy
ayah_en: and he is the allforgiving allloving

ayah_ar: ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡمَجِيدُ
label: joy
ayah_en: lord of the throne the allglorious

ayah_ar: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا قُعُودٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: when they sat around it

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُكَذِّبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: in fact the disbelievers persist in denial

ayah_ar: فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
label: anger
ayah_en: so give them good news of a painful punishment

ayah_ar: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: obeying its lord as it must

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُدَّتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: and when the earth is flattened out

ayah_ar: وَأَلۡقَتۡ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: and ejects all its contents and becomes empty

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
label: fear
ayah_en: o humanity indeed you are labouring restlessly towards your lord and will eventually meet the consequences

ayah_ar: فَسَوۡفَ يَدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: they will cry for instant destruction

ayah_ar: وَيَصۡلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
label: fear
ayah_en: and will burn in the blazing fire

ayah_ar: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: yes they would surely their lord has always been allseeing of them

ayah_ar: لَتَرۡكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: you will certainly pass from one state to another

ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: but allah knows best whatever they hide

ayah_ar: فَسَوۡفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابٗا يَسِيرٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: they will have an easy reckoning

ayah_ar: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: and will return to their people joyfully

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and by the moon when it waxes full

ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ
label: joy
ayah_en: but those who believe and do good will have a neverending reward

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and as for those who are given their record in their left hand from behind their backs

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِيٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورًا
label: sadness
ayah_en: for they used to be prideful among their people

ayah_ar: وَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: woe to the defrauders

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمۡ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمۡ يُخۡسِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but give less when they measure or weigh for buyers

ayah_ar: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
label: anger
ayah_en: none would deny it except every evildoing transgressor

ayah_ar: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: whenever our revelations are recited to them they say ancient fables

ayah_ar: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but no in fact their hearts have been stained by all the evil they used to commit

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُواْ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
label: anger
ayah_en: moreover they will surely burn in hell

ayah_ar: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: do such people not think that they will be resurrected

ayah_ar: لِيَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: for a tremendous day

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: the day all people will stand before the lord of all worlds

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: and what will make you realize what sijjin is

ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: undoubtedly they will be sealed off from their lord on that day

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and then be told this is what you used to deny

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed the wicked used to laugh at the believers

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and when they saw the faithful they would say these people are truly astray

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: even though they were not sent as keepers over the believers

ayah_ar: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: the believers will be asked have the disbelievers not been paid back for what they used to do

ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: but no the virtuous are certainly bound for illiyn in elevated gardens

ayah_ar: يَشۡهَدُهُ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: witnessed by those nearest to allah

ayah_ar: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: seated on canopied couches gazing around

ayah_ar: تَعۡرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: you will recognize on their faces the glow of delight

ayah_ar: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ
label: anger
ayah_en: but no in fact you deny the final judgment

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ ٱلۡفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: and the wicked will be in hell

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ
label: anger
ayah_en: it is the day no soul will be of any benefit to another whatsoever for all authority on that day belongs to allah entirely

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلۡكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: and when the stars fall away

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: and when the seas burst forth

ayah_ar: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ وَأَخَّرَتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: then each soul will know what it has sent forth or left behind

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَحَٰفِظِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: while you are certainly observed by vigilant

ayah_ar: وَمَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and they will have no escape from it

ayah_ar: كِرَامٗا كَٰتِبِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: honourable angels recording everything

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed the virtuous will be in bliss

ayah_ar: يَعۡلَمُونَ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: they know whatever you do

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: and when the records of deeds are laid open

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: and when the hellfire is fiercely flared up

ayah_ar: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and the day as it breaks

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا عَسۡعَسَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and the night as it falls

ayah_ar: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: full of power held in honour by the lord of the throne

ayah_ar: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَسۡتَقِيمَ
label: joy
ayah_en: to whoever of you wills to take the straight way

ayah_ar: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: but you cannot will to do so except by the will of allah the lord of all worlds

ayah_ar: بِأَيِّ ذَنۢبٖ قُتِلَتۡ
label: sadness
ayah_en: for what crime they were put to death

ayah_ar: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّآ أَحۡضَرَتۡ
label: sadness
ayah_en: on that day each soul will know what deeds it has brought along

ayah_ar: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلۡغَيۡبِ بِضَنِينٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and he does not withhold what is revealed to him of the unseen

ayah_ar: قُتِلَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكۡفَرَهُۥ
label: anger
ayah_en: condemned are disbelieving humans how ungrateful they are to allah

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَفَرَةُ ٱلۡفَجَرَةُ
label: anger
ayah_en: those are the disbelievers the wicked sinners

ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذۡكِرَةٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: but no this revelation is truly a reminder

ayah_ar: مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
label: fear
ayah_en: he created them from a spermdrop and ordained their development

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقۡبَرَهُۥ
label: fear
ayah_en: then causes them to die and be buried

ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقۡضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
label: fear
ayah_en: but no they have failed to comply with what he ordered

ayah_ar: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
label: fear
ayah_en: let people then consider their food

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ شَقَقۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ شَقّٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: and meticulously split the earth open for sprouts

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ
label: fear
ayah_en: then when the deafening blast comes to pass

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مِنۡ أَخِيهِ
label: fear
ayah_en: on that day every person will flee from their own siblings

ayah_ar: وَوُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَلَيۡهَا غَبَرَةٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: while other faces will be dusty

ayah_ar: فِي صُحُفٖ مُّكَرَّمَةٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: it is written on pages held in honour

ayah_ar: مَّرۡفُوعَةٖ مُّطَهَّرَةِۭ
label: joy
ayah_en: highly esteemed purified

ayah_ar: بِأَيۡدِي سَفَرَةٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: by the hands of angelscribes

ayah_ar: كِرَامِۭ بَرَرَةٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: honourable and virtuous

ayah_ar: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلۡبٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: and dense orchards

ayah_ar: وَفَٰكِهَةٗ وَأَبّٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: and fruit and fodder

ayah_ar: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّسۡفِرَةٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: on that day some faces will be bright

ayah_ar: ضَاحِكَةٞ مُّسۡتَبۡشِرَةٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: laughing and rejoicing

ayah_ar: وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
label: sadness
ayah_en: you never know o prophet perhaps he may be purified

ayah_ar: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمٗا نَّخِرَةٗ
label: anger
ayah_en: even after we have been reduced to decayed bones

ayah_ar: ٱذۡهَبۡ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: commanding go to pharaoh for he has truly transgressed all bounds

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ يَسۡعَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: then turned his back striving against the truth

ayah_ar: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: then he summoned his people and called out

ayah_ar: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: saying i am your lord the most high

ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّٰزِعَٰتِ غَرۡقٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: by those angels stripping out evil souls harshly

ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّٰشِطَٰتِ نَشۡطٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: and those pulling out good souls gently

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
label: fear
ayah_en: consider the day when the quaking blast will come to pass

ayah_ar: تَتۡبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
label: fear
ayah_en: followed by a second blast

ayah_ar: قُلُوبٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَاجِفَةٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: the deniers hearts on that day will be trembling in horror

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجۡرَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: but indeed it will take only one mighty blast

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
label: fear
ayah_en: and at once they will be above ground

ayah_ar: ٱذۡهَبۡ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: commanding go to pharaoh for he has truly transgressed all bounds

ayah_ar: وَأَهۡدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخۡشَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: and let me guide you to your lord so that you will be in awe of him

ayah_ar: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰٓ
label: fear
ayah_en: so allah overtook him making him an example in this life and the next

ayah_ar: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا
label: fear
ayah_en: which is harder to create you or the sky he built it

ayah_ar: وَأَغۡطَشَ لَيۡلَهَا وَأَخۡرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
label: fear
ayah_en: he dimmed its night and brought forth its daylight

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ
label: fear
ayah_en: as for the earth he spread it out as well

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: the day every person will remember all their striving

ayah_ar: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلۡجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: and the hellfire will be displayed for all to see

ayah_ar: يَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرۡسَىٰهَا
label: fear
ayah_en: they ask you o prophet regarding the hour when will it be

ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ
label: fear
ayah_en: that knowledge rests with your lord alone

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰهَا
label: fear
ayah_en: your duty is only to warn whoever is in awe of it

ayah_ar: أَخۡرَجَ مِنۡهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرۡعَىٰهَا
label: joy
ayah_en: bringing forth its water and pastures

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَرۡسَىٰهَا
label: joy
ayah_en: and setting the mountains firmly upon it

ayah_ar: مَتَٰعٗا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَٰمِكُمۡ
label: joy
ayah_en: all as a means of sustenance for you and your animals

ayah_ar: مَتَٰعٗا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَٰمِكُمۡ
label: joy
ayah_en: all as a means of sustenance for you and your animals

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: and as for those who were in awe of standing before their lord and restrained themselves from evil desires

ayah_ar: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرۡدُودُونَ فِي ٱلۡحَافِرَةِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: but now they ask mockingly will we really be restored to our former state

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ تِلۡكَ إِذٗا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: adding then such a return would be a total loss for us

ayah_ar: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلۡأٓيَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
label: sadness
ayah_en: then moses showed him the great sign

ayah_ar: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا
label: sadness
ayah_en: and preferred the fleeting life of this world

ayah_ar: كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوۡ ضُحَىٰهَا
label: sadness
ayah_en: on the day they see it it will be as if they had stayed in the world no more than one evening or its morning

ayah_ar: وَبَنَيۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعٗا شِدَادٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: and built above you seven mighty heavens

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَرۡجُونَ حِسَابٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: for they never expected any reckoning

ayah_ar: وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كِذَّابٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: and totally rejected our signs

ayah_ar: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: what are they asking one another about

ayah_ar: إِنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ كَانَ مِيقَٰتٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed the day of final decision is an appointed time

ayah_ar: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: the sky will be split open becoming many gates

ayah_ar: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ فَكَانَتۡ سَرَابًا
label: fear
ayah_en: and the mountains will be blown away becoming like a mirage

ayah_ar: فَذُوقُواْ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمۡ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
label: fear
ayah_en: so the deniers will be told taste the punishment for all you will get from us is more torment

ayah_ar: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: the lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between the most compassionate no one will dare speak to him

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلۡنَا سِرَاجٗا وَهَّاجٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: and placed in them a shining lamp

ayah_ar: وَجَنَّٰتٍ أَلۡفَافًا
label: joy
ayah_en: and dense orchards

ayah_ar: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعۡنَٰبٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: gardens vineyards

ayah_ar: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّٰبٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: never to hear any idle talk or lying therein

ayah_ar: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: woe on that day to the deniers

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: when it is said to them bow down before allah they do not bow

ayah_ar: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثِۭ بَعۡدَهُۥ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so what message after this quran would they believe in

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely what you are promised will come to pass

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: so when the stars are put out

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: and the sky is torn apart

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ نُسِفَتۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: and the mountains are blown away

ayah_ar: لِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ
label: fear
ayah_en: for the day of final decision

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ
label: fear
ayah_en: and what will make you realize what the day of decision is

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفۡعَلُ بِٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: this is how we deal with the wicked

ayah_ar: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: the disbelievers will be told proceed into that fire which you used to deny

ayah_ar: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
label: fear
ayah_en: providing neither coolness nor shelter from the flames

ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا تَرۡمِي بِشَرَرٖ كَٱلۡقَصۡرِ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed it hurls sparks as big as huge castles

ayah_ar: وَلَا يُؤۡذَنُ لَهُمۡ فَيَعۡتَذِرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: nor will they be permitted to offer excuses

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِۖ جَمَعۡنَٰكُمۡ وَٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: they will be told by allah this is the day of final decision we have gathered you along with earlier disbelievers for punishment

ayah_ar: فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٍ
label: joy
ayah_en: placing it in a secure place

ayah_ar: فَقَدَرۡنَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡقَٰدِرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: we perfectly ordained its development how excellent are we in doing so

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ كِفَاتًا
label: joy
ayah_en: have we not made the earth a lodging

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَٰلٖ وَعُيُونٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed the righteous will be amid cool shade and springs

ayah_ar: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and any fruit they desire

ayah_ar: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: they will be told eat and drink happily for what you used to do

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: surely this is how we reward the gooddoers

ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: until an appointed time

ayah_ar: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمۡ كَيۡدٞ فَكِيدُونِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so if you have a scheme to save yourselves then use it against me

ayah_ar: كُلُواْ وَتَمَتَّعُواْ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجۡرِمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: eat and enjoy yourselves for a little while for you are truly wicked

ayah_ar: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
label: fear
ayah_en: we already showed them the way whether they choose to be grateful or ungrateful

ayah_ar: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: they are those who fulfil their vows and fear a day of sweeping horror

ayah_ar: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: we fear from our lord a horribly distressful day

ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: surely those pagans love this fleeting world totally neglecting a weighty day ahead of them

ayah_ar: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَآ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَآ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِيلًا
label: fear
ayah_en: it is we who created them and perfected their physical form but if we will we can easily replace them with others

ayah_ar: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا
label: joy
ayah_en: for indeed we alone created humans from a drop of mixed fluids in order to test them so we made them hear and see

ayah_ar: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: so allah will deliver them from the horror of that day and grant them radiance and joy

ayah_ar: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُواْ جَنَّةٗ وَحَرِيرٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: and reward them for their perseverance with a garden in paradise and garments of silk

ayah_ar: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: the gardens shade will be right above them and its fruit will be made very easy to reach

ayah_ar: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٖ مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَا۠
label: joy
ayah_en: they will be waited on with silver vessels and cups of crystal

ayah_ar: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed it is we who have revealed the quran to you o prophet in stages

ayah_ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا
label: joy
ayah_en: and prostrate before him during part of the night

ayah_ar: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: so be patient with your lords decree and do not yield to any evildoer or staunch disbeliever from among them

ayah_ar: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
label: anger
ayah_en: all will then be informed of what they have sent forth and left behind

ayah_ar: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلۡفِرَاقُ
label: anger
ayah_en: and the dying person realizes it is their time to depart

ayah_ar: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: this denier neither believed nor prayed

ayah_ar: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: but persisted in denial and turned away

ayah_ar: وَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلنَّفۡسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
label: fear
ayah_en: and i do swear by the selfreproaching soul

ayah_ar: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ لِيَفۡجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
label: fear
ayah_en: still people want to deny what is yet to come

ayah_ar: يَسۡـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ
label: fear
ayah_en: asking mockingly when is this day of judgment

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ
label: fear
ayah_en: but when the sight is stunned

ayah_ar: وَخَسَفَ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
label: fear
ayah_en: and the moon is dimmed

ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
label: fear
ayah_en: but no there will be no refuge

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: in fact people will testify against their own souls

ayah_ar: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and neglect the hereafter

ayah_ar: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفۡعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: anticipating something devastating to befall them

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
label: fear
ayah_en: and then their feet are tied together in a shroud

ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡمَسَاقُ
label: fear
ayah_en: on that day they will be driven to your lord alone

ayah_ar: أَيَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتۡرَكَ سُدًى
label: fear
ayah_en: do people think they will be left without purpose

ayah_ar: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا جَمۡعَهُۥ وَقُرۡءَانَهُۥ
label: joy
ayah_en: it is certainly upon us to make you memorize and recite it

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡنَٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعۡ قُرۡءَانَهُۥ
label: joy
ayah_en: so once we have recited a revelation through gabriel follow its recitation closely

ayah_ar: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاضِرَةٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: on that day some faces will be bright

ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: looking at their lord

ayah_ar: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: is such a creator unable to bring the dead back to life

ayah_ar: وَوُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَاسِرَةٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and other faces will be gloomy

ayah_ar: عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ غَيۡرُ يَسِيرٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: far from easy for the disbelievers

ayah_ar: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمۡهِيدٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: and made life very easy for him

ayah_ar: كَلَّآۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِأٓيَٰتِنَا عَنِيدٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: but no for he has been truly stubborn with our revelations

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ
label: anger
ayah_en: then turned his back on the truth and acted arrogantly

ayah_ar: لَا تُبۡقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
label: anger
ayah_en: it does not let anyone live or die

ayah_ar: مَا سَلَكَكُمۡ فِي سَقَرَ
label: anger
ayah_en: what has landed you in hell

ayah_ar: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلۡخَآئِضِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: we used to indulge in falsehood along with others

ayah_ar: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
label: anger
ayah_en: and deny the day of judgment

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي ٱلنَّاقُورِ
label: fear
ayah_en: for when the trumpet will be sounded

ayah_ar: سَأُصۡلِيهِ سَقَرَ
label: fear
ayah_en: soon i will burn him in hell

ayah_ar: عَلَيۡهَا تِسۡعَةَ عَشَرَ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is overseen by nineteen keepers

ayah_ar: نَذِيرٗا لِّلۡبَشَرِ
label: fear
ayah_en: a warning to humankind

ayah_ar: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمۡ شَفَٰعَةُ ٱلشَّٰفِعِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so the pleas of intercessors will be of no benefit to them

ayah_ar: فَرَّتۡ مِن قَسۡوَرَةِۭ
label: fear
ayah_en: fleeing from a lion

ayah_ar: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرۡ
label: joy
ayah_en: revere your lord alone

ayah_ar: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَآ أَسۡفَرَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and the day as it breaks

ayah_ar: فِي جَنَّٰتٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: who will be in gardens asking one another

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَمۡنُن تَسۡتَكۡثِرُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: do not do a favour expecting more in return

ayah_ar: إِلَّآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: except the people of the right

ayah_ar: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ
label: sadness
ayah_en: in fact each one of them wishes to be given a personal letter from allah for all to read

ayah_ar: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا
label: anger
ayah_en: and leave to me the deniersthe people of luxuryand bear with them for a little while

ayah_ar: وَطَعَامٗا ذَا غُصَّةٖ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: choking food and a painful punishment in store for them

ayah_ar: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: but pharaoh disobeyed the messenger so we seized him with a stern grip

ayah_ar: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed worship in the night is more impactful and suitable for recitation

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِيبٗا مَّهِيلًا
label: fear
ayah_en: on the day the earth and mountains will shake violently and mountains will be reduced to dunes of shifting sand

ayah_ar: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡمٗا يَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنَ شِيبًا
label: fear
ayah_en: if you pagans persist in disbelief then how will you guard yourselves against the horrors of a day which will turn childrens hair grey

ayah_ar: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا
label: fear
ayah_en: it will even cause the sky to split apart his promise of judgment must be fulfilled

ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
label: fear
ayah_en: surely this is a reminder so let whoever wills take the right way to their lord

ayah_ar: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا
label: joy
ayah_en: or a little moreand recite the quran properly in a measured way

ayah_ar: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبۡحٗا طَوِيلٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: for during the day you are overoccupied with worldly duties

ayah_ar: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: always remember the name of your lord and devote yourself to him wholeheartedly

ayah_ar: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِيلٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: he is the lord of the east and the west there is no god worthy of worship except him so take him alone as a trustee of affairs

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: now we truly know that we cannot frustrate allah on earth nor can we escape from him into heaven

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡاْ رَشَدٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: and among us are those who have submitted to allah and those who are deviant so as for those who submitted it is they who have attained right guidance

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدۡعُوهُ كَادُواْ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: yet when the servant of allah stood up calling upon him alone the pagans almost swarmed over him

ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرٗا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: only when they see what they have been threatened with will they know who is weaker in helpers and inferior in manpower

ayah_ar: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا
label: fear
ayah_en: say i do not know if what you are promised is near or my lord has set a distant time for it

ayah_ar: قُلۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسۡتَمَعَ نَفَرٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا قُرۡءَانًا عَجَبٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: say o prophet it has been revealed to me that a group of jinn listened to the quran and said to their fellow jinn indeed we have heard a wondrous recitation

ayah_ar: يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: it leads to right guidance so we believed in it and we will never associate anyone with our lord in worship

ayah_ar: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: had the deniers followed the right way we would have certainly granted them abundant rain to drink

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: the places of worship are only for allah so do not invoke anyone besides him

ayah_ar: عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَلَا يُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيۡبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
label: joy
ayah_en: he is the knower of the unseen disclosing none of it to anyone

ayah_ar: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا كُبَّارٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: and who have devised a tremendous plot

ayah_ar: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: those elite have already led many astray so o lord only allow the wrongdoers to stray farther away

ayah_ar: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: saying seek your lords forgiveness for he is truly most forgiving

ayah_ar: يُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّدۡرَارٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: he will shower you with abundant rain

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: placing the moon within them as a reflected light and the sun as a radiant lamp

ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: allah alone caused you to grow from the earth like a plant

ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: and allah alone spread out the earth for you

ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ
label: sadness
ayah_en: noah proclaimed o my people i am truly sent to you with a clear warning

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: he cried my lord i have surely called my people day and night

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
label: sadness
ayah_en: noah had prayed my lord do not leave a single disbeliever on earth

ayah_ar: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: for if you spare any of them they will certainly mislead your servants and give birth only to wicked sinners staunch disbelievers

ayah_ar: وَنَرَىٰهُ قَرِيبٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: but we see it as inevitable

ayah_ar: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمۡ غَيۡرُ مَأۡمُونٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: knowing that none should feel secure from their lords punishment

ayah_ar: فَمَالِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ قِبَلَكَ مُهۡطِعِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so what is the matter with the disbelievers that they rush headlong towards you o prophet

ayah_ar: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: through which the angels and the holy spirit

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمۡ يَرَوۡنَهُۥ بَعِيدٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: they truly see this day as impossible

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ تَكُونُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ كَٱلۡمُهۡلِ
label: fear
ayah_en: on that day the sky will be like molten brass

ayah_ar: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِي مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِيهِ
label: fear
ayah_en: although they will be made to see each other the wicked will wish to ransom themselves from the punishment of that day by their children

ayah_ar: كَلَّآۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: but no there will certainly be a raging flame

ayah_ar: نَزَّاعَةٗ لِّلشَّوَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: ripping off scalps

ayah_ar: تَدۡعُواْ مَنۡ أَدۡبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: it will summon whoever turned their backs on allah and turned away from the truth

ayah_ar: ۞إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed humankind was created impatient

ayah_ar: إِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ جَزُوعٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: distressed when touched with evil

ayah_ar: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: but whoever seeks beyond that are the transgressors

ayah_ar: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يُوعَدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: with eyes downcast utterly covered with disgrace that is the day they have always been warned of

ayah_ar: فَٱصۡبِرۡ صَبۡرٗا جَمِيلًا
label: joy
ayah_en: so endure this denial o  prophet with beautiful patience

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ يُحَافِظُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and who are properly observant of their prayers

ayah_ar: أَيَطۡمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُدۡخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: does every one of them expect to be admitted into a garden of bliss

ayah_ar: فَهَلۡ تَرَىٰ لَهُم مِّنۢ بَاقِيَةٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: do you see any of them left alive

ayah_ar: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ
label: anger
ayah_en: also pharaoh and those before him and the people of the overturned cities of lot indulged in sin

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ
label: anger
ayah_en: then burn them in hell

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
label: anger
ayah_en: for they never had faith in allah the greatest

ayah_ar: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ
label: anger
ayah_en: nor encouraged the feeding of the poor

ayah_ar: ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ
label: fear
ayah_en: the inevitable hour

ayah_ar: مَا ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ
label: fear
ayah_en: what is the inevitable hour

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ
label: fear
ayah_en: and what will make you realize what the inevitable hour is

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ
label: fear
ayah_en: as for thamd they were destroyed by an overwhelming blast

ayah_ar: فَعَصَوۡاْ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَةٗ رَّابِيَةً
label: fear
ayah_en: each disobeying their lords messenger so he seized them with a crushing grip

ayah_ar: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed when the floodwater had overflowed we carried you in the floating ark with noah

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: at last when the trumpet will be blown with one blast

ayah_ar: وَٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَهِيَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَاهِيَةٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: the sky will then be so torn that it will be frail

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡجَآئِهَاۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ ثَمَٰنِيَةٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: with the angels on its sides on that day eight mighty angels will bear the throne of your lord above them

ayah_ar: هَلَكَ عَنِّي سُلۡطَٰنِيَهۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: my authority has been stripped from me

ayah_ar: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ
label: fear
ayah_en: it will be said seize and shackle them

ayah_ar: فَلَيۡسَ لَهُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ هَٰهُنَا حَمِيمٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: so this day they will have no close friend here

ayah_ar: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنۡ غِسۡلِينٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: nor any food except oozing pus

ayah_ar: لَّا يَأۡكُلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡخَٰطِـُٔونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: which none will eat except the evildoers

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعۡنَا مِنۡهُ ٱلۡوَتِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: then severed his aorta

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقۡرَءُواْ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ
label: joy
ayah_en: as for those given their records in their right hand they will cry happily here everyone read my record

ayah_ar: إِنِّي ظَنَنتُ أَنِّي مُلَٰقٍ حِسَابِيَهۡ
label: joy
ayah_en: i surely knew i would face my reckoning

ayah_ar: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَآ أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَيَّامِ ٱلۡخَالِيَةِ
label: joy
ayah_en: they will be told eat and drink joyfully for what you did in the days gone by

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَذۡكِرَةٞ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed this quran is a reminder to those mindful of allah

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَقُّ ٱلۡيَقِينِ
label: joy
ayah_en: and indeed this quran is the absolute truth

ayah_ar: لِنَجۡعَلَهَا لَكُمۡ تَذۡكِرَةٗ وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٞ وَٰعِيَةٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so that we may make this a reminder to you and that attentive ears may grasp it

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: you will then be presented before him for judgment and none of your secrets will stay hidden

ayah_ar: يَٰلَيۡتَهَا كَانَتِ ٱلۡقَاضِيَةَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: i wish death was the end

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَسۡرَةٌ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and it will surely be a source of regret for the disbelievers

ayah_ar: وَلَا تُطِعۡ كُلَّ حَلَّافٖ مَّهِينٍ
label: anger
ayah_en: and do not obey the despicable vain oathtaker

ayah_ar: هَمَّازٖ مَّشَّآءِۭ بِنَمِيمٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: slanderer gossipmonger

ayah_ar: مَّنَّاعٖ لِّلۡخَيۡرِ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
label: anger
ayah_en: withholder of good transgressor evildoer

ayah_ar: عُتُلِّۭ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ زَنِيمٍ
label: anger
ayah_en: brute andon top of all thatan illegitimate child

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يُكۡشَفُ عَن سَاقٖ وَيُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: beware of the day the shin of allah will be bared and the wicked will be asked to prostrate but they will not be able to do so

ayah_ar: فَذَرۡنِي وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِۖ سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so leave to me o prophet those who reject this message we will gradually draw them to destruction in ways they cannot comprehend

ayah_ar: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَيُزۡلِقُونَكَ بِأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡ لَمَّا سَمِعُواْ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: the disbelievers would almost cut you down with their eyes when they hear you recite the reminder and say he is certainly a madman

ayah_ar: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so do not give in to the deniers

ayah_ar: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: whenever our revelations are recited to him he says ancient fables

ayah_ar: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: then it was struck by a torment from your lord while they slept

ayah_ar: فَتَنَادَوۡاْ مُصۡبِحِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: then by daybreak they called out to each other

ayah_ar: وَغَدَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡدٖ قَٰدِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and they proceeded early totally fixated on their purpose

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: that is the way of our punishment in this world but the punishment of the hereafter is certainly far worse if only they knew

ayah_ar: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُواْ يُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَٰلِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: with eyes downcast totally covered with disgrace for they were always called to prostrate in the world when they were fully capable but they chose not to

ayah_ar: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: but it is simply a reminder to the whole world

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجۡرًا غَيۡرَ مَمۡنُونٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: you will certainly have a neverending reward

ayah_ar: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed the righteous will have the gardens of bliss with their lord

ayah_ar: إِنَّ لَكُمۡ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: that you will have whatever you choose

ayah_ar: لَّوۡلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلۡعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذۡمُومٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: had he not been shown grace by his lord he would have certainly been cast onto the open shore still blameworthy

ayah_ar: فَٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَجَعَلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: then his lord chose him making him one of the righteous

ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: surely your lord alone knows best who has strayed from his way and who is rightly guided

ayah_ar: فَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ يَتَلَٰوَمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: then they turned on each other throwing blame

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا طَٰغِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: they said woe to us we have certainly been transgressors

ayah_ar: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so be patient with your lords decree and do not be like jonah the man of the whale who cried out to allah in total distress

ayah_ar: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
label: anger
ayah_en: those who disbelieve in their lord will suffer the punishment of hell what an evil destination

ayah_ar: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ
label: anger
ayah_en: when they are tossed into it they will hear its roaring as it boils over

ayah_ar: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
label: anger
ayah_en: how could he not know his own creation for he alone is the most subtle allaware

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
label: anger
ayah_en: and certainly those before them denied as well then how severe was my response

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبۡلُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ
label: fear
ayah_en: he is the one who created death and life in order to test which of you is best in deeds and he is the almighty allforgiving

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِمَصَٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا رُجُومٗا لِّلشَّيَٰطِينِۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
label: fear
ayah_en: and indeed we adorned the lowest heaven with stars like lamps and made them as missiles for stoning eavesdropping devils for whom we have also prepared the torment of the blaze

ayah_ar: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَيۡظِۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلۡقِيَ فِيهَا فَوۡجٞ سَأَلَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: almost bursting in fury every time a group is cast into it its keepers will ask them did a warner not come to you

ayah_ar: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ
label: fear
ayah_en: do you feel secure that the one who is in heaven will not cause the earth to swallow you up as it quakes violently

ayah_ar: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذِيرِ
label: fear
ayah_en: or do you feel secure that the one who is in heaven will not unleash upon you a storm of stones only then would you know how serious my warning was

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed those in awe of their lord without seeing him will have forgiveness and a mighty reward

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَنقَلِبۡ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئٗا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: then look again and againyour sight will return frustrated and weary

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٞ فَكَذَّبۡنَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ كَبِيرٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: they will reply yes a warner did come to us but we denied and said allah has revealed nothing you are extremely astray

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and they will lament if only we had listened and reasoned we would not be among the residents of the blaze

ayah_ar: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: say o prophet that knowledge is with allah alone and i am only sent with a clear warning

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: the deniers will then be told o disbelievers make no excuses this day you are only rewarded for what you used to do

ayah_ar: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ نُوحٖ وَٱمۡرَأَتَ لُوطٖۖ كَانَتَا تَحۡتَ عَبۡدَيۡنِ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا صَٰلِحَيۡنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمۡ يُغۡنِيَا عَنۡهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَقِيلَ ٱدۡخُلَا ٱلنَّارَ مَعَ ٱلدَّٰخِلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: allah sets forth an example for the disbelievers the wife of noah and the wife of lot each was married to one of our righteous servants yet betrayed them so their husbands were of no benefit to them against allah whatsoever both were told enter the fire along with the others

ayah_ar: قَدۡ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
label: fear
ayah_en: allah has already ordained for you believers the way to absolve yourselves from your oaths for allah is your guardian and he is the allknowing allwise

ayah_ar: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِذۡ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ ٱبۡنِ لِي عِندَكَ بَيۡتٗا فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِي مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَعَمَلِهِۦ وَنَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and allah sets forth an example for the believers the wife of pharaoh who prayed my lord build me a house in paradise near you deliver me from pharaoh and his evil doing and save me from the wrongdoing people

ayah_ar: وَمَرۡيَمَ ٱبۡنَتَ عِمۡرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: there is also the example of mary the daughter of imran who guarded her chastity so we breathed into her womb through our angel gabriel she testified to the words of her lord and his scriptures and was one of the sincerely devout

ayah_ar: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ عَتَتۡ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا وَرُسُلِهِۦ فَحَاسَبۡنَٰهَا حِسَابٗا شَدِيدٗا وَعَذَّبۡنَٰهَا عَذَابٗا نُّكۡرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: imagine how many societies rebelled against the commandments of their lord and his messengers so we called each society to a severe account and subjected them to a horrible punishment

ayah_ar: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗاۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ قَدۡ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡكُمۡ ذِكۡرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: allah has also prepared for them a severe punishment so fear allah o  people of reason and faith allah has indeed revealed to you a reminder

ayah_ar: فَذَاقَتۡ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهَا وَكَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ أَمۡرِهَا خُسۡرًا
label: fear
ayah_en: so they tasted the evil consequences of their doings and the outcome of their doings was total loss

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ أَنزَلَهُۥٓ إِلَيۡكُمۡۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يُكَفِّرۡ عَنۡهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُعۡظِمۡ لَهُۥٓ أَجۡرًا
label: joy
ayah_en: this is the commandment of allah which he has revealed to you and whoever is mindful of allah he will absolve them of their sins and reward them immensely

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
label: anger
ayah_en: as for those who disbelieve and reject our revelations they will be the residents of the fire staying there forever what an evil destination

ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُمۡ فَمِنكُمۡ كَافِرٞ وَمِنكُم مُّؤۡمِنٞۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: he is the one who created you yet some of you are disbelievers while some are believers and allah is allseeing of what you do

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ فَذَاقُواْ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: have the stories of those who disbelieved before not reached you pagans they tasted the evil consequences of their doings and they will suffer a painful punishment

ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمۡ فَأَحۡسَنَ صُوَرَكُمۡۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
label: joy
ayah_en: he created the heavens and the earth for a purpose he shaped you in the womb perfecting your form and to him is the final return

ayah_ar: فَـَٔامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلنُّورِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلۡنَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: so believe in allah and his messenger and in the light we have revealed and allah is allaware of what you do

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: allahthere is no god worthy of worship except him so in allah let the believers put their trust

ayah_ar: عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: he is the knower of the seen and unseenthe almighty allwise

ayah_ar: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِ قَلۡبَهُۥۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: no calamity befalls anyone except by allahs will and whoever has faith in allah he will rightly guide their hearts through adversity and allah has perfect knowledge of all things

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞۚ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: your wealth and children are only a test but allah alone has a great reward

ayah_ar: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they have made their false oaths as a shield hindering others from the way of allah evil indeed is what they do

ayah_ar: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: but allah never delays a soul when its appointed time comes and allah is allaware of what you do

ayah_ar: وَأَنفِقُواْ مِن مَّا رَزَقۡنَٰكُم مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ فَيَقُولَ رَبِّ لَوۡلَآ أَخَّرۡتَنِيٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ قَرِيبٖ فَأَصَّدَّقَ وَأَكُن مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and donate from what we have provided for you before death comes to one of you and you cry my lord if only you delayed me for a short while i would give in charity and be one of the righteous

ayah_ar: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَمَّا يَلۡحَقُواْ بِهِمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: along with others of them who have not yet joined them in faith for he is the almighty allwise

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: this is the favour of allah he grants it to whoever he wills and allah is the lord of infinite bounty

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا نُودِيَ لِلصَّلَوٰةِ مِن يَوۡمِ ٱلۡجُمُعَةِ فَٱسۡعَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ وَذَرُواْ ٱلۡبَيۡعَۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: o believers when the call to prayer is made on friday then proceed diligently to the remembrance of allah and leave off your business that is best for you if only you knew

ayah_ar: كَبُرَ مَقۡتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُواْ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: how despicable it is in the sight of allah that you say what you do not do

ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلۡحَقِّ لِيُظۡهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: he is the one who has sent his messenger with true guidance and the religion of truth making it prevail over all others even to the dismay of the polytheists

ayah_ar: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ ذُنُوبَكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلۡكُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ وَمَسَٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةٗ فِي جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٖۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: he will forgive your sins and admit you into gardens under which rivers flow and house you in splendid homes in the gardens of eternity that is the ultimate triumph

ayah_ar: وَأُخۡرَىٰ تُحِبُّونَهَاۖ نَصۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَتۡحٞ قَرِيبٞۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: he will also give you another favour that you long for help from allah and an imminent victory so give good news o prophet to the believers

ayah_ar: لَن تَنفَعَكُمۡ أَرۡحَامُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡۚ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: neither your relatives nor children will benefit you on judgment dayhe will decide between you all for allah is allseeing of what you do

ayah_ar: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا رَبَّنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
label: fear
ayah_en: our lord do not subject us to the persecution of the disbelievers forgive us our lord you alone are truly the almighty allwise

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ قَوۡمًا غَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ قَدۡ يَئِسُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ كَمَا يَئِسَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡقُبُورِ
label: fear
ayah_en: o believers do not ally yourselves with a people allah is displeased with they already have no hope for the hereafter just like the disbelievers lying in their graves

ayah_ar: ۞عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَجۡعَلَ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلَّذِينَ عَادَيۡتُم مِّنۡهُم مَّوَدَّةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ قَدِيرٞۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: in time allah may bring about goodwill between you and those of them you now hold as enemies for allah is most capable and allah is allforgiving most merciful

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۖ وَمَن يُشَآقِّ ٱللَّهَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
label: anger
ayah_en: this is because they defied allah and his messenger and whoever defies allah then allah is truly severe in punishment

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡجَلَآءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابُ ٱلنَّارِ
label: fear
ayah_en: had allah not decreed exile for them he would have certainly punished them in this world and in the hereafter they will suffer the punishment of the fire

ayah_ar: لَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ رَهۡبَةٗ فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed there is more fear in their hearts for you believers than for allah that is because they are a people who do not comprehend

ayah_ar: كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ قَرِيبٗاۖ ذَاقُواْ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: they are both just like those who recently went down before them they tasted the evil consequences of their doings and they will suffer a painful punishment

ayah_ar: كَمَثَلِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ إِذۡ قَالَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ ٱكۡفُرۡ فَلَمَّا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّنكَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: they are like satan when he lures someone to disbelieve then after they have done so he will say on judgment day i have absolutely nothing to do with you i truly fear allahthe lord of all worlds

ayah_ar: لَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ عَلَىٰ جَبَلٖ لَّرَأَيۡتَهُۥ خَٰشِعٗا مُّتَصَدِّعٗا مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: had we sent down this quran upon a mountain you would have certainly seen it humbled and torn apart in awe of allah we set forth such comparisons for people so perhaps they may reflect

ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡقُدُّوسُ ٱلسَّلَٰمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُ ٱلۡمُهَيۡمِنُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡجَبَّارُ ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: he is allahthere is no god except him the king the most holy the allperfect the source of serenity the watcher of all the almighty the supreme in might the majestic glorified is allah far above what they associate with him in worship

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُو ٱلدَّارَ وَٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ يُحِبُّونَ مَنۡ هَاجَرَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِي صُدُورِهِمۡ حَاجَةٗ مِّمَّآ أُوتُواْ وَيُؤۡثِرُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَلَوۡ كَانَ بِهِمۡ خَصَاصَةٞۚ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفۡسِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: as for those who had settled in the city and embraced the faith before the arrival of the emigrants they love whoever immigrates to them never having a desire in their hearts for whatever of the gains is given to the emigrants they give the emigrants preference over themselves even though they may be in need and whoever is saved from the selfishness of their own souls it is they who are truly successful

ayah_ar: لَا يَسۡتَوِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: the residents of the fire cannot be equal to the residents of paradise only the residents of paradise will be successful

ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: he is allahthere is no god worthy of worship except him knower of the seen and unseen he is the most compassionate most merciful

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and do not be like those who forgot allah so he made them forget themselves it is they who are truly rebellious

ayah_ar: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: they have made their false oaths as a shield hindering others from the cause of allah so they will suffer a humiliating punishment

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡأَذَلِّينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: as for those who defy allah and his messenger they will definitely be among the most debased

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يَبۡعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعٗا فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوٓاْۚ أَحۡصَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ وَنَسُوهُۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: on the day allah resurrects them all together he will then inform them of what they have done allah has kept account of it all while they have forgotten it for allah is a witness over all things

ayah_ar: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: allah has prepared for them a severe punishment evil indeed is what they do

ayah_ar: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغۡلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِيٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: allah has decreed i and my messengers will certainly prevail surely allah is allpowerful almighty

ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُ وَٱلۡأٓخِرُ وَٱلظَّٰهِرُ وَٱلۡبَاطِنُۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: he is the first and the last the most high and most near and he has perfect knowledge of all things

ayah_ar: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
label: fear
ayah_en: he merges the night into day and the day into night and he knows best what is hidden in the heart

ayah_ar: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُؤۡخَذُ مِنكُمۡ فِدۡيَةٞ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ مَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ هِيَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
label: fear
ayah_en: so today no ransom will be accepted from you hypocrites nor from the disbelievers your home is the fireit is the only fitting place for you what an evil destination

ayah_ar: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ قَدۡ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: know that allah revives the earth after its death we have certainly made the signs clear for you so perhaps you will understand

ayah_ar: لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ
label: joy
ayah_en: to him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and to allah all matters are returned

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتُ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱنظُرُونَا نَقۡتَبِسۡ مِن نُّورِكُمۡ قِيلَ ٱرۡجِعُواْ وَرَآءَكُمۡ فَٱلۡتَمِسُواْ نُورٗاۖ فَضُرِبَ بَيۡنَهُم بِسُورٖ لَّهُۥ بَابُۢ بَاطِنُهُۥ فِيهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَةُ وَظَٰهِرُهُۥ مِن قِبَلِهِ ٱلۡعَذَابُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: on that day hypocrite men and women will beg the believers wait for us so that we may have some of your light it will be said mockingly go back to the world and seek a light there then a separating wall with a gate will be erected between them on the near side will be grace and on the far side will be torment

ayah_ar: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِيٓ أَنفُسِكُمۡ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن نَّبۡرَأَهَآۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: no calamity or blessing occurs on earth or in yourselves without being written in a record before we bring it into being this is certainly easy for allah

ayah_ar: لِّئَلَّا يَعۡلَمَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أَلَّا يَقۡدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ مِّن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡفَضۡلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: this is so that the people of the book who deny the prophet may know that they do not have any control over allahs grace and that all grace is in allahs hands he grants it to whoever he wills for allah is the lord of infinite bounty

ayah_ar: فَشَٰرِبُونَ شُرۡبَ ٱلۡهِيمِ
label: anger
ayah_en: and you will drink it like thirsty camels do

ayah_ar: نَحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ فَلَوۡلَا تُصَدِّقُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: it is we who created you will you not then believe in resurrection

ayah_ar: وَتَجۡعَلُونَ رِزۡقَكُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: and repay allah for your provisions with denial

ayah_ar: إِذَا وَقَعَتِ ٱلۡوَاقِعَةُ
label: fear
ayah_en: when the inevitable event takes place

ayah_ar: فَكَانَتۡ هَبَآءٗ مُّنۢبَثّٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: becoming scattered particles of dust

ayah_ar: وَظِلّٖ مِّن يَحۡمُومٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: in the shade of black smoke

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُتۡرَفِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed before this torment they were spoiled by luxury

ayah_ar: لَمَجۡمُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِيقَٰتِ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: will surely be gathered together for the appointed day

ayah_ar: فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: filling up your bellies with it

ayah_ar: فَشَٰرِبُونَ عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ
label: fear
ayah_en: then on top of that you will drink boiling water

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا نُزُلُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ
label: fear
ayah_en: this will be their accommodation on the day of judgment

ayah_ar: بَلۡ نَحۡنُ مَحۡرُومُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: in fact we have been deprived of our livelihood

ayah_ar: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: if we willed we could make it salty will you not then give thanks

ayah_ar: فَلَوۡلَآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلۡحُلۡقُومَ
label: fear
ayah_en: why then are you helpless when the soul of a dying person reaches their throat

ayah_ar: تَرۡجِعُونَهَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: bring that soul back if what you say is true

ayah_ar: وَتَصۡلِيَةُ جَحِيمٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: and burning in hellfire

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: they are the ones nearest to allah

ayah_ar: فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: in the gardens of bliss

ayah_ar: فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: in the gardens of bliss

ayah_ar: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّوۡضُونَةٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: all will be on jewelled thrones

ayah_ar: كَأَمۡثَٰلِ ٱللُّؤۡلُوِٕ ٱلۡمَكۡنُونِ
label: joy
ayah_en: like pristine pearls

ayah_ar: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا
label: joy
ayah_en: there they will never hear any idle or sinful talk

ayah_ar: فِي سِدۡرٖ مَّخۡضُودٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: they will be amid thornless lote trees

ayah_ar: وَظِلّٖ مَّمۡدُودٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: extended shade

ayah_ar: وَفَٰكِهَةٖ كَثِيرَةٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: abundant fruit

ayah_ar: وَفُرُشٖ مَّرۡفُوعَةٍ
label: joy
ayah_en: and elevated furnishings

ayah_ar: نَحۡنُ جَعَلۡنَٰهَا تَذۡكِرَةٗ وَمَتَٰعٗا لِّلۡمُقۡوِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: we have made it as a reminder of the hellfire and a provision for the travellers

ayah_ar: فِي كِتَٰبٖ مَّكۡنُونٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: in a wellpreserved record

ayah_ar: لَّا يَمَسُّهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُطَهَّرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: touched by none except the purified angels

ayah_ar: فَرَوۡحٞ وَرَيۡحَانٞ وَجَنَّتُ نَعِيمٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: then such a person will have serenity fragrance and a garden of bliss

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَنشَأۡنَٰهُنَّ إِنشَآءٗ
label: sadness
