ayah_en: indeed we will have perfectly created their mates

ayah_ar: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
label: anger
ayah_en: then which of your lords favours will you humans and jinn both deny

ayah_ar: كُلُّ مَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا فَانٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: every being on earth is bound to perish

ayah_ar: أَلَّا تَطۡغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡمِيزَانِ
label: fear
ayah_en: so that you do not defraud the scales

ayah_ar: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلۡوَزۡنَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَلَا تُخۡسِرُواْ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ
label: fear
ayah_en: weigh with justice and do not give short measure

ayah_ar: وَخَلَقَ ٱلۡجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٖ مِّن نَّارٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: and created jinn from a smokeless flame of fire

ayah_ar: يُرۡسَلُ عَلَيۡكُمَا شُوَاظٞ مِّن نَّارٖ وَنُحَاسٞ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
label: fear
ayah_en: flames of fire and molten copper will be sent against you and you will not be able to defend one another

ayah_ar: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: on that day there will be no need for any human or jinn to be asked about their sins

ayah_ar: يَطُوفُونَ بَيۡنَهَا وَبَيۡنَ حَمِيمٍ ءَانٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: they will alternate between its flames and scalding water

ayah_ar: ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ
label: joy
ayah_en: the most compassionate

ayah_ar: عَلَّمَهُ ٱلۡبَيَانَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and taught them speech

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلۡأَنَامِ
label: joy
ayah_en: he laid out the earth for all beings

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡحَبُّ ذُو ٱلۡعَصۡفِ وَٱلرَّيۡحَانُ
label: joy
ayah_en: and grain with husks and aromatic plants

ayah_ar: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: all those in the heavens and the earth are dependent on him day in and day out he has something to bring about

ayah_ar: ذَوَاتَآ أَفۡنَانٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: both will be with lush branches

ayah_ar: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَٰكِهَةٖ زَوۡجَانِ
label: joy
ayah_en: in each will be two types of every fruit

ayah_ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقٖۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ دَانٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: those believers will recline on furnishings lined with rich brocade and the fruit of both gardens will hang within reach

ayah_ar: مُدۡهَآمَّتَانِ
label: joy
ayah_en: both will be dark green

ayah_ar: فِيهِمَا عَيۡنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ
label: joy
ayah_en: in each will be two gushing springs

ayah_ar: فِيهِمَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَنَخۡلٞ وَرُمَّانٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: in both will be fruit palm trees and pomegranates

ayah_ar: حُورٞ مَّقۡصُورَٰتٞ فِي ٱلۡخِيَامِ
label: joy
ayah_en: they will be maidens with gorgeous eyes reserved in pavilions

ayah_ar: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ
label: joy
ayah_en: blessed is the name of your lord full of majesty and honour

ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ كَٱلۡفَخَّارِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: he created humankind from sounding clay like pottery

ayah_ar: يُعۡرَفُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمۡ فَيُؤۡخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِي وَٱلۡأَقۡدَامِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: the wicked will be recognized by their appearance then will be seized by their forelocks and feet

ayah_ar: ٱقۡتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
label: anger
ayah_en: the hour has drawn near and the moon was split in two

ayah_ar: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: has the revelation been sent down only to him out of all of us in fact he is a boastful liar

ayah_ar: سَيَعۡلَمُونَ غَدٗا مَّنِ ٱلۡكَذَّابُ ٱلۡأَشِرُ
label: anger
ayah_en: it was revealed to salih they will soon know who the boastful liar is

ayah_ar: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ
label: anger
ayah_en: we are sending the shecamel as a test for them so watch them closely and have patience

ayah_ar: فَنَادَوۡاْ صَاحِبَهُمۡ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but they roused a companion of theirs so he dared to kill her

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ
label: anger
ayah_en: indeed we sent against them only one mighty blast leaving them like the twigs of fencebuilders

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٖۖ نَّجَّيۡنَٰهُم بِسَحَرٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: we unleashed upon them a storm of stones as for the believers of lots family we delivered them before dawn

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ أَنذَرَهُم بَطۡشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوۡاْ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
label: anger
ayah_en: he had already warned them of our crushing blow but they disputed the warnings

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ صَبَّحَهُم بُكۡرَةً عَذَابٞ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: and indeed by the early morning they were overwhelmed by an unrelenting torment

ayah_ar: حِكۡمَةُۢ بَٰلِغَةٞۖ فَمَا تُغۡنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
label: fear
ayah_en: this quran is profound in wisdom but warnings are of no benefit to them

ayah_ar: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: with eyes downcast they will come forth from the graves as if they were swarming locusts

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا صَرۡصَرٗا فِي يَوۡمِ نَحۡسٖ مُّسۡتَمِرّٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed we sent against them a furious wind on a day of unrelenting misery

ayah_ar: سَيُهۡزَمُ ٱلۡجَمۡعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
label: fear
ayah_en: soon their united front will be defeated and forced to flee

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed the wicked are entrenched in misguidance and are bound for blazes

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
label: fear
ayah_en: on the day they will be dragged into the fire on their faces they will be told taste the touch of hell

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ بِقَدَرٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed we have created everything perfectly preordained

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ
label: fear
ayah_en: our command done in the blink of an eye

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: we have already destroyed the likes of you so will any of you be mindful

ayah_ar: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and caused the earth to burst with springs so the waters met for a fate already set

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: and we have certainly made the quran easy to remember so is there anyone who will be mindful

ayah_ar: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ
label: joy
ayah_en: as a blessing from us this is how we reward whoever gives thanks

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّٰتٖ وَنَهَرٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed the righteous will be amid gardens and rivers

ayah_ar: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ
label: joy
ayah_en: at the seat of honour in the presence of the most powerful sovereign

ayah_ar: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: they rejected the truth and followed their own desiresand every matter will be settled

ayah_ar: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَغۡلُوبٞ فَٱنتَصِرۡ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so he cried out to his lord i am helpless so help me

ayah_ar: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَبَشَرٗا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدٗا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٍ
label: sadness
ayah_en: arguing how can we follow one average human being from among us we would then truly be misguided and insane

ayah_ar: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٖ وَكَبِيرٖ مُّسۡتَطَرٌ
label: sadness
ayah_en: every matter small and large is written precisely

ayah_ar: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰٓ
label: anger
ayah_en: nor does he speak of his own whims

ayah_ar: أَلَكُمُ ٱلذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ ٱلۡأُنثَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: do you prefer to have sons while you attribute to him daughters

ayah_ar: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: in fact to allah alone belongs this world and the next

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ تَسۡمِيَةَ ٱلۡأُنثَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: indeed those who do not believe in the hereafter label angels as female

ayah_ar: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَلَمۡ يُرِدۡ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا
label: anger
ayah_en: so turn away o prophet from whoever has shunned our reminder only seeking the fleeting life of this world

ayah_ar: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: have you seen the one who turned away from islam

ayah_ar: أَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰٓ
label: anger
ayah_en: does he have the knowledge of the unseen so that he sees the hereafter

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥٓ أَهۡلَكَ عَادًا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: and he destroyed the first people of d

ayah_ar: وَثَمُودَاْ فَمَآ أَبۡقَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: and then thamd sparing no one

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَةَ أَهۡوَىٰ
label: anger
ayah_en: and it was he who turned the cities of sodom and gomorrah upside down

ayah_ar: أَزِفَتِ ٱلۡأٓزِفَةُ
label: anger
ayah_en: the approaching hour has drawn near

ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّجۡمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: by the stars when they fade away

ayah_ar: إِذۡ يَغۡشَى ٱلسِّدۡرَةَ مَا يَغۡشَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: while the lote tree was overwhelmed with heavenly splendours

ayah_ar: أَمۡ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: or should every person simply have whatever intercessors they desire

ayah_ar: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَٰٓـُٔواْ بِمَا عَمِلُواْ وَيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَى
label: fear
ayah_en: to allah alone belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth so that he may reward the evildoers according to what they did and reward the gooddoers with the finest reward

ayah_ar: وَأَعۡطَىٰ قَلِيلٗا وَأَكۡدَىٰٓ
label: fear
ayah_en: and initially paid a little for his salvation and then stopped

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحۡيَا
label: fear
ayah_en: and he is the one who gives life and causes death

ayah_ar: فَغَشَّىٰهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: how overwhelming was what covered them

ayah_ar: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
label: fear
ayah_en: now which of your lords favours will you dispute

ayah_ar: لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: none but allah can disclose it

ayah_ar: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمۡ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: your fellow man is neither misguided nor astray

ayah_ar: عَلَّمَهُۥ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡقُوَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: he has been taught by one angel of mighty power

ayah_ar: عِندَ سِدۡرَةِ ٱلۡمُنتَهَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: at the lote tree of the most extreme limit in the seventh heaven

ayah_ar: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ
label: joy
ayah_en: he certainly saw some of his lords greatest signs

ayah_ar: وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلَّذِي وَفَّىٰٓ
label: joy
ayah_en: and that of abraham who perfectly fulfilled his covenant

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ يُجۡزَىٰهُ ٱلۡجَزَآءَ ٱلۡأَوۡفَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: then they will be fully rewarded

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَضۡحَكَ وَأَبۡكَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: moreover he is the one who brings about joy and sadness

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَغۡنَىٰ وَأَقۡنَىٰ
label: joy
ayah_en: and he is the one who enriches and impoverishes

ayah_ar: مَا كَذَبَ ٱلۡفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰٓ
label: sadness
ayah_en: the prophets heart did not doubt what he saw

ayah_ar: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـٔٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: although they have no knowledge in support of this they follow nothing but inherited assumptions and surely assumptions can in no way replace the truth

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِي خَوۡضٖ يَلۡعَبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: those who amuse themselves with falsehood

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
label: anger
ayah_en: it is the day they will be fiercely shoved into the fire of hell

ayah_ar: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they will be told this is the fire which you used to deny

ayah_ar: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: or do their intelligent minds prompt them to this paradox or are they just a transgressing people

ayah_ar: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: or do they possess the treasuries of your lord or are they in control of everything

ayah_ar: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: or are you o prophet asking them for a reward for the message so that they are overburdened by debt

ayah_ar: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: or do they intend to scheme against the prophet then it is the disbelievers who will fall victim to their schemes

ayah_ar: وَٱلطُّورِ
label: fear
ayah_en: by mount r

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ ٱلۡمَسۡجُورِ
label: fear
ayah_en: and by the seas set on fire

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوۡرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: on the day the heavens will be shaken violently

ayah_ar: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا فَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْ أَوۡ لَا تَصۡبِرُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: burn in it it is the same whether you endure it patiently or not you are only rewarded for what you used to do

ayah_ar: وَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: they will turn to one another inquisitively

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: the day their scheming will be of no benefit to them whatsoever nor will they be helped

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّٰتٖ وَنَعِيمٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed the righteous will be in gardens and bliss

ayah_ar: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: enjoying whatever their lord will have granted them and their lord will have protected them from the torment of the hellfire

ayah_ar: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: they will be told eat and drink happily for what you used to do

ayah_ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: they will be reclining on thrones neatly lined up facing each other and we will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّبَعَتۡهُمۡ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَٰنٍ أَلۡحَقۡنَا بِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ وَمَآ أَلَتۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيِٕۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: as for those who believe and whose descendants follow them in faith we will elevate their descendants to their rank never discounting anything of the reward of their deeds every person will reap only what they sowed

ayah_ar: وَأَمۡدَدۡنَٰهُم بِفَٰكِهَةٖ وَلَحۡمٖ مِّمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and we will continually provide them with whatever fruit or meat they desire

ayah_ar: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: they will pass around to each other a drink of pure wine which leads to no idle talk or sinfulness

ayah_ar: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: and they will be waited on by their youthful servants like spotless pearls

ayah_ar: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
label: joy
ayah_en: so allah has graced us and protected us from the torment of hells scorching heat

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed we used to call upon him alone before he is truly the most kind most merciful

ayah_ar: وَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَاۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
label: joy
ayah_en: so be patient with your lords decree for you are truly under our watchful eyes and glorify the praises of your lord when you rise

ayah_ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَإِدۡبَٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
label: joy
ayah_en: and glorify him during part of the night and at the fading of the stars

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: they will say before this reward we used to be in awe of allah in the midst of our people

ayah_ar: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so continue to remind all o  prophet for you by the grace of your lord are not a fortuneteller or a madman

ayah_ar: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: say keep waiting i too am waiting with you

ayah_ar: إِنَّكُمۡ لَفِي قَوۡلٖ مُّخۡتَلِفٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: surely you are lost in conflicting views regarding the truth

ayah_ar: يُؤۡفَكُ عَنۡهُ مَنۡ أُفِكَ
label: anger
ayah_en: only those destined to be deluded are turned away from it

ayah_ar: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: so we seized him and his soldiers casting them into the sea while he was blameworthy

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُواْ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ
label: anger
ayah_en: similarly no messenger came to those before them without being told a magician or a madman

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed what you are promised is true

ayah_ar: قُتِلَ ٱلۡخَرَّٰصُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: condemned are the liars

ayah_ar: يَسۡـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ
label: fear
ayah_en: they ask mockingly when is this day of judgment

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ هُمۡ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفۡتَنُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is the day they will be tormented over the fire

ayah_ar: وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلۡمُوقِنِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: there are countless signs on earth for those with sure faith

ayah_ar: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
label: fear
ayah_en: there was nothing it came upon that it did not reduce to ashes

ayah_ar: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: so proclaim o  prophet flee to allah i am truly sent by him with a clear warning to you

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ
label: fear
ayah_en: the wrongdoers will certainly have a share of the torment like that of their predecessors so do not let them ask me to hasten it

ayah_ar: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: woe then to the disbelievers when they face their day which they are warned of

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّٰتٖ وَعُيُونٍ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed the righteous will be amid gardens and springs

ayah_ar: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحۡسِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: joyfully receiving what their lord will grant them before this reward they were truly gooddoers in the world

ayah_ar: وَبِٱلۡأَسۡحَارِ هُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and pray for forgiveness before dawn

ayah_ar: وَفِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقُكُمۡ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: in heaven is your sustenance and whatever you are promised

ayah_ar: فَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَةٗۖ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: they did not eat so he grew fearful of them

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: they replied such has your lord decreed he is truly the allwise allknowing

ayah_ar: وَذَكِّرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: but continue to remind for certainly reminders benefit the believers

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed allah alone is the supreme providerlord of all power ever mighty

ayah_ar: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: they used to sleep only little in the night

ayah_ar: وَفِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ حَقّٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلۡمَحۡرُومِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and in their wealth there was a rightful share fulfilled for the beggar and the poor

ayah_ar: وَفِيٓ أَنفُسِكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: as there are within yourselves can you not see

ayah_ar: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: then they were not able to rise up nor were they helped

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and do not set up another god with allah i am truly sent by him with a clear warning to you

ayah_ar: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطۡعِمُونِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: i seek no provision from them nor do i need them to feed me

ayah_ar: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: it will be said to both angels throw into hell every stubborn disbeliever

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
label: anger
ayah_en: who set up another god with allah so cast them into the severe punishment

ayah_ar: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ
label: anger
ayah_en: allah will respond do not dispute in my presence since i had already given you a warning

ayah_ar: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا فَنَقَّبُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
label: anger
ayah_en: imagine how many peoples we destroyed before them who were far mightier than them then when the torment came they desperately sought refuge in the land but was there any escape

ayah_ar: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: will we be returned to life when we are dead and reduced to dust such a return is impossible

ayah_ar: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ
label: fear
ayah_en: we certainly know what the earth consumes of them after their death and with us is a wellpreserved record

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَٰهَا وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجِۭ بَهِيجٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: as for the earth we spread it out and placed upon it firm mountains and produced in it every type of pleasant plant

ayah_ar: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: as the two recordingangelsone sitting to the right and the other to the leftnote everything

ayah_ar: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: not a word does a person utter without having a vigilant observer ready to write it down

ayah_ar: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: each soul will come forth with an angel to drive it and another to testify

ayah_ar: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ
label: fear
ayah_en: my word cannot be changed nor am i unjust to my creation

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمۡتَلَأۡتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلۡ مِن مَّزِيدٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: beware of the day we will ask hell are you full yet and it will respond are there any more

ayah_ar: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: who were in awe of the most compassionate without seeing him and have come with a heart turning only to him

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely in this is a reminder for whoever has a mindful heart and lends an attentive ear

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed we created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six days

ayah_ar: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: and listen on the day the caller will call out from a near place

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ يَسۡمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيۡحَةَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُرُوجِ
label: fear
ayah_en: the day all will hear the mighty blast in all truth that will be the day of emergence from the graves

ayah_ar: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is certainly we who give life and cause death and to us is the final return

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَاعٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَيۡنَا يَسِيرٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: beware of the day the earth will split open letting them rush forth that will be an easy gathering for us

ayah_ar: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِجَبَّارٖۖ فَذَكِّرۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
label: fear
ayah_en: we know best what they say and you o prophet are not there to compel them to believe so remind with the quran only those who fear my warning

ayah_ar: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ
label: joy
ayah_en: and we send down blessed rain from the sky bringing forth gardens and grains for harvest

ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّخۡلَ بَاسِقَٰتٖ لَّهَا طَلۡعٞ نَّضِيدٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: and towering palm trees loaded with clustered fruit

ayah_ar: رِّزۡقٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِۖ وَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخُرُوجُ
label: joy
ayah_en: as a provision for our servants and with this rain we revive a lifeless land similar is the emergence from the graves

ayah_ar: لَّقَدۡ كُنتَ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفۡنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ حَدِيدٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: it will be said to the denier you were totally heedless of this now we have lifted this veil of yours so today your sight is sharp

ayah_ar: وَأُزۡلِفَتِ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ غَيۡرَ بَعِيدٍ
label: joy
ayah_en: and paradise will be brought near to the righteous not far off

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: and it will be said to them this is what you were promised for whoever constantly turned to allah and kept up his commandments

ayah_ar: ٱدۡخُلُوهَا بِسَلَٰمٖۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُلُودِ
label: joy
ayah_en: enter it in peace this is the day of eternal life

ayah_ar: مَّنَّاعٖ لِّلۡخَيۡرِ مُعۡتَدٖ مُّرِيبٍ
label: sadness
ayah_en: withholder of good transgressor and doubter

ayah_ar: ۞قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطۡغَيۡتُهُۥ وَلَٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: ones devilish associate will say our lord i did not make them transgress rather they were far astray on their own

ayah_ar: فَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ ٱلۡغُرُوبِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so be patient o prophet with what they say and glorify the praises of your lord before sunrise and before sunset

ayah_ar: قُلۡ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: say do you inform allah of your faith when allah already knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth and allah has perfect knowledge of all things

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِخۡوَةٞ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَ أَخَوَيۡكُمۡۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: the believers are but one brotherhood so make peace between your brothers and be mindful of allah so you may be shown mercy

ayah_ar: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: this is a bounty and a blessing from allah and allah is allknowing allwise

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: surely allah knows the unseen of the heavens and earth and allah is allseeing of what you do

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ صَبَرُواْ حَتَّىٰ تَخۡرُجَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: had they been patient until you could come out to them it would have certainly been better for them and allah is allforgiving most merciful

ayah_ar: قُل لِّلۡمُخَلَّفِينَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ سَتُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٍ أُوْلِي بَأۡسٖ شَدِيدٖ تُقَٰتِلُونَهُمۡ أَوۡ يُسۡلِمُونَۖ فَإِن تُطِيعُواْ يُؤۡتِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَجۡرًا حَسَنٗاۖ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ كَمَا تَوَلَّيۡتُم مِّن قَبۡلُ يُعَذِّبۡكُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: say to nomadic arabs who stayed behind you will be called to fight against a people of great might who you will fight unless they submit if you then obey allah will grant you a fine reward but if you turn away as you did before he will inflict upon you a painful punishment

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡ قَٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوَلَّوُاْ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
label: anger
ayah_en: if the disbelievers were to fight you they would certainly flee then they would never find any protector or helper

ayah_ar: وَأُخۡرَىٰ لَمۡ تَقۡدِرُواْ عَلَيۡهَا قَدۡ أَحَاطَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا
label: fear
ayah_en: and there are other gains which are beyond your reach that allah is keeping in store for you for allah is most capable of everything

ayah_ar: إِنَّا فَتَحۡنَا لَكَ فَتۡحٗا مُّبِينٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed we have granted you a clear triumph o prophet

ayah_ar: وَيَنصُرَكَ ٱللَّهُ نَصۡرًا عَزِيزًا
label: joy
ayah_en: and so that allah will help you tremendously

ayah_ar: لِّتُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُۚ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلًا
label: joy
ayah_en: so that you believers may have faith in allah and his messenger support and honour him and glorify allah morning and evening

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
label: anger
ayah_en: those who disbelieve and hinder others from the way of allah he will render their deeds void

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَرِهُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
label: anger
ayah_en: that is because they detest what allah has revealed so he has rendered their deeds void

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱتَّبَعُواْ مَآ أَسۡخَطَ ٱللَّهَ وَكَرِهُواْ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
label: anger
ayah_en: this is because they follow whatever displeases allah and hate whatever pleases him so he has rendered their deeds void

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كُفَّارٞ فَلَن يَغۡفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ
label: anger
ayah_en: surely those who disbelieve hinder others from the way of allah and then die as disbelievers allah will never forgive them

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَتَعۡسٗا لَّهُمۡ وَأَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: as for the disbelievers may they be doomed and may he render their deeds void

ayah_ar: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ أَمۡ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقۡفَالُهَآ
label: fear
ayah_en: do they not then reflect on the quran or are there locks upon their hearts

ayah_ar: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخۡرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضۡغَٰنَهُمۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: or do those with sickness in their hearts think that allah will not be able to expose their malice

ayah_ar: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُجَٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ وَنَبۡلُوَاْ أَخۡبَارَكُمۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: we will certainly test you believers until we prove those of you who truly struggle in allahs cause and remain steadfast and reveal how you conduct yourselves

ayah_ar: ۞يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبۡطِلُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ
label: fear
ayah_en: o believers obey allah and obey the messenger and do not let your deeds be in vain

ayah_ar: هَٰٓأَنتُمۡ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ تُدۡعَوۡنَ لِتُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبۡخَلُۖ وَمَن يَبۡخَلۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَبۡخَلُ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۚ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ يَسۡتَبۡدِلۡ قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوٓاْ أَمۡثَٰلَكُم
label: fear
ayah_en: here you are being invited to donate a little in the cause of allah still some of you withhold and whoever does so it is only to their own loss for allah is the selfsufficient whereas you stand in need of him if you still turn away he will replace you with another people and they will not be like you

ayah_ar: وَيُدۡخِلُهُمُ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ عَرَّفَهَا لَهُمۡ
label: joy
ayah_en: and admit them into paradise having made it known to them

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ
label: sadness
ayah_en: this is because allah is the patron of the believers while the disbelievers have no patron

ayah_ar: طَاعَةٞ وَقَوۡلٞ مَّعۡرُوفٞۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ فَلَوۡ صَدَقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡ
label: sadness
ayah_en: to obey and speak rightly then when fighting was ordained it surely would have been better for them if they were true to allah

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَأۡفِكَنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they argued have you come to turn us away from our gods bring us then whatever you threaten us with if what you say is true

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: we certainly destroyed the societies around you after having varied the signs so perhaps they would return to the right path

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا حُشِرَ ٱلنَّاسُ كَانُواْ لَهُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ وَكَانُواْ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and when such people will be gathered together those gods will be their enemies and will disown their worship

ayah_ar: وَلِكُلّٖ دَرَجَٰتٞ مِّمَّا عَمِلُواْۖ وَلِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: each of the two groups will be ranked according to what they have done so he may fully reward all and none will be wronged

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهُ عَارِضٗا مُّسۡتَقۡبِلَ أَوۡدِيَتِهِمۡ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا عَارِضٞ مُّمۡطِرُنَاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ مَا ٱسۡتَعۡجَلۡتُم بِهِۦۖ رِيحٞ فِيهَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: then when they saw the torment as a dense cloud approaching their valleys they said happily this is a cloud bringing us rain but hd replied no it is what you sought to hasten a fierce wind carrying a painful punishment

ayah_ar: تُدَمِّرُ كُلَّ شَيۡءِۭ بِأَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا فَأَصۡبَحُواْ لَا يُرَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَسَٰكِنُهُمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: it destroyed everything by the command of its lord leaving nothing visible except their ruins this is how we reward the wicked people

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: it is they who will be the residents of paradise staying there forever as a reward for what they used to do

ayah_ar: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ إِحۡسَٰنًاۖ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُمُّهُۥ كُرۡهٗا وَوَضَعَتۡهُ كُرۡهٗاۖ وَحَمۡلُهُۥ وَفِصَٰلُهُۥ ثَلَٰثُونَ شَهۡرًاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗ قَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِيٓۖ إِنِّي تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: we have commanded people to honour their parents their mothers bore them in hardship and delivered them in hardship their period of bearing and weaning is thirty months in time when the child reaches their prime at the age of forty they pray my lord inspire me to always be thankful for your favours which you blessed me and my parents with and to do good deeds that please you and instil righteousness in my offspring i truly repent to you and i truly submit to your will

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ نَتَقَبَّلُ عَنۡهُمۡ أَحۡسَنَ مَا عَمِلُواْ وَنَتَجَاوَزُ عَن سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ وَعۡدَ ٱلصِّدۡقِ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يُوعَدُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: it is from these people that we will accept the good they did and overlook their misdeedsalong with the residents of paradise in fulfilment of the true promise they have been given

ayah_ar: قُلۡ مَا كُنتُ بِدۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ وَمَآ أَدۡرِي مَا يُفۡعَلُ بِي وَلَا بِكُمۡۖ إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: say i am not the first messenger ever sent nor do i know what will happen to me or you i only follow what is revealed to me and i am only sent with a clear warning

ayah_ar: قَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَأُبَلِّغُكُم مَّآ أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِهِۦ وَلَٰكِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكُمۡ قَوۡمٗا تَجۡهَلُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: he responded the knowledge of its time is only with allah i only convey to you what i have been sent with but i can see that you are a people acting ignorantly

ayah_ar: يَٰقَوۡمَنَآ أَجِيبُواْ دَاعِيَ ٱللَّهِ وَءَامِنُواْ بِهِۦ يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُجِرۡكُم مِّنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: o  our fellow jinn respond to the caller of allah and believe in him he will forgive your sins and protect you from a painful punishment

ayah_ar: فَٱصۡبِرۡ كَمَا صَبَرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡعَزۡمِ مِنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ وَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِل لَّهُمۡۚ كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ مَا يُوعَدُونَ لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا سَاعَةٗ مِّن نَّهَارِۭۚ بَلَٰغٞۚ فَهَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: so endure patiently as did the messengers of firm resolve this is a sufficient warning then will anyone be destroyed except the rebellious people

ayah_ar: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: woe to every sinful liar

ayah_ar: يَسۡمَعُ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ يُصِرُّ مُسۡتَكۡبِرٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ يَسۡمَعۡهَاۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: they hear allahs revelations recited to them then persist in denial arrogantly as if they did not hear them so give them good news of a painful punishment

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّكُمُ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوٗا وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡرَجُونَ مِنۡهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: this is because you made a mockery of allahs revelations and were deluded by your worldly life so from that day on they will not be taken out of the fire nor will they be allowed to appease their lord

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely in the creation of the heavens and the earth are signs for the believers

ayah_ar: مِّن وَرَآئِهِمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُم مَّا كَسَبُواْ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا مَا ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡلِيَآءَۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: awaiting them is hell their worldly gains will not be of any benefit to them whatsoever nor will those protectors they have taken besides allah and they will suffer a tremendous punishment

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا هُدٗىۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مِّن رِّجۡزٍ أَلِيمٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: this quran is true guidance and those who deny their lords revelations will suffer the worst torment of agonizing pain

ayah_ar: مَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَنۡ أَسَآءَ فَعَلَيۡهَاۖ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: whoever does good it is to their own benefit and whoever does evil it is to their own loss then to your lord you will all be returned

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا بَصَٰٓئِرُ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: this quran is an insight for humanitya guide and mercy for people of sure faith

ayah_ar: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَخۡسَرُ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: to allah alone belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth on the day the hour will be established the people of falsehood will then be in total loss

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا كِتَٰبُنَا يَنطِقُ عَلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا نَسۡتَنسِخُ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: this record of ours speaks the truth about you indeed we always had your deeds recorded by the angels

ayah_ar: وَقِيلَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَنسَىٰكُمۡ كَمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَا وَمَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: it will be said this day we will neglect you as you neglected the meeting of this day of yours your home will be the fire and you will have no helpers

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَىٰ شَرِيعَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ فَٱتَّبِعۡهَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡوَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: now we have set you o prophet on the clear way of faith so follow it and do not follow the desires of those who do not know the truth

ayah_ar: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: so all praise is for allahlord of the heavens and lord of the earth lord of all worlds

ayah_ar: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثِۭ بَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ وَءَايَٰتِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: these are allahs revelations which we recite to you o prophet in truth so what message will they believe in after denying allah and his revelations

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: indeed we sent it down on a blessed night for we always warn against evil

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ
label: anger
ayah_en: then they turned away from him saying a madman taught by others

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: then on the day we will deal you the fiercest blow we will surely inflict punishment

ayah_ar: كَمۡ تَرَكُواْ مِن جَنَّٰتٖ وَعُيُونٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: imagine how many gardens and springs the tyrants left behind

ayah_ar: فِيهَا يُفۡرَقُ كُلُّ أَمۡرٍ حَكِيمٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: on that night every matter of wisdom is ordained

ayah_ar: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: wait then o prophet for the day when the sky will be veiled in haze clearly visible

ayah_ar: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: our lord remove this torment from us and we will certainly believe

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed we will remove that torment for a while and you meccans will return to disbelief

ayah_ar: فَأَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِي لَيۡلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: allah responded leave with my servants at night for you will surely be pursued

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَأَوۡرَثۡنَٰهَا قَوۡمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so it was and we awarded it all to another people

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدِ ٱخۡتَرۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and indeed we chose the israelites knowingly above the others

ayah_ar: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: and we showed them signs in which there was a clear test

ayah_ar: مَا خَلَقۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: we only created them for a purpose but most of these pagans do not know

ayah_ar: إِنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ مِيقَٰتُهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely the day of final decision is the time appointed for all

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي مَوۡلًى عَن مَّوۡلٗى شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: the day no kith or kin will be of benefit to another whatsoever nor will they be helped

ayah_ar: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely the fruit of the tree of zaqqm

ayah_ar: كَٱلۡمُهۡلِ يَغۡلِي فِي ٱلۡبُطُونِ
label: fear
ayah_en: like molten metal it will boil in the bellies

ayah_ar: كَغَلۡيِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ
label: fear
ayah_en: like the boiling of hot water

ayah_ar: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِلَّا ٱلۡمَوۡتَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
label: fear
ayah_en: there they will never taste death beyond the first death and he will protect them from the punishment of the hellfire

ayah_ar: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ إِنَّهُم مُّرۡتَقِبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: wait then they too are certainly waiting

ayah_ar: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: as a mercy from your lord he alone is truly the allhearing allknowing

ayah_ar: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ رَبُّكُمۡ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: there is no god worthy of worship except him he alone gives life and causes death he is your lord and the lord of your forefathers

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: except those shown mercy by allah he is truly the almighty most merciful

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي مَقَامٍ أَمِينٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed the righteous will be in a secure place

ayah_ar: فِي جَنَّٰتٖ وَعُيُونٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: amid gardens and springs

ayah_ar: يَلۡبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٖ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٖ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: dressed in fine silk and rich brocade facing one another

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: so it will be and we will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes

ayah_ar: يَدۡعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: there they will call for every fruit in serenity

ayah_ar: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: as an act of grace from your lord that is truly the ultimate triumph

ayah_ar: بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ يَلۡعَبُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: in fact they are in doubt amusing themselves

ayah_ar: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: how can they be reminded when a messenger has already come to them making things clear

ayah_ar: وَأَن لَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and do not be arrogant with allah i have certainly come to you with a compelling proof

ayah_ar: وَإِن لَّمۡ تُؤۡمِنُواْ لِي فَٱعۡتَزِلُونِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: but if you do not believe me then let me be

ayah_ar: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: ultimately he cried out to his lord these are a wicked people

ayah_ar: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and leave the sea parted for they are certainly an army bound to drown

ayah_ar: فَمَا بَكَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنظَرِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: neither heaven nor earth wept over them nor was their fate delayed

ayah_ar: طَعَامُ ٱلۡأَثِيمِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: will be the food of the evildoer

ayah_ar: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَن كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّسۡرِفِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: should we then turn the quranic reminder away from you simply because you have been a transgressing people

ayah_ar: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِيٍّ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but no prophet ever came to them without being mocked

ayah_ar: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so we destroyed those who were far mightier than these meccans the examples of their predecessors have already been related

ayah_ar: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَاتٖ وَأَصۡفَىٰكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: has he taken angels as his daughters from what he created and favoured you o pagans with sons

ayah_ar: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: or have we given them a book for proof before this quran to which they are holding firm

ayah_ar: وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّنِي بَرَآءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡبُدُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: remember o  prophet when abraham declared to his father and his people i am totally free of whatever gods you worship

ayah_ar: وَمَن يَعۡشُ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ نُقَيِّضۡ لَهُۥ شَيۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: and whoever turns a blind eye to the reminder of the most compassionate we place at the disposal of each a devilish one as their close associate

ayah_ar: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: even if we take you away from this world we will surely inflict punishment upon them

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but as soon as we removed the torments from them they broke their promise

ayah_ar: ٱلۡأَخِلَّآءُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: close friends will be enemies to one another on that day except the righteous

ayah_ar: قُلۡ إِن كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَلَدٞ فَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡعَٰبِدِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: say o prophet if the most compassionate really had offspring i would be the first worshipper

ayah_ar: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: allah is aware of the prophets cry o my lord indeed these are a people who persist in disbelief

ayah_ar: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so we inflicted punishment upon them see then what was the fate of the deniers

ayah_ar: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡتُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَرَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: in fact i had allowed enjoyment for these meccans and their forefathers until the truth came to them along with a messenger making things clear

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن يَكُونَ ٱلنَّاسُ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ لَّجَعَلۡنَا لِمَن يَكۡفُرُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ لِبُيُوتِهِمۡ سُقُفٗا مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَمَعَارِجَ عَلَيۡهَا يَظۡهَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: were it not that people might be tempted to become one community of disbelievers we would have supplied the homes of only those who disbelieve in the most compassionate with silver roofs and silver stairways to ascend

ayah_ar: وَلِبُيُوتِهِمۡ أَبۡوَٰبٗا وَسُرُرًا عَلَيۡهَا يَتَّكِـُٔونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: as well as silver gates and thrones to recline on

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: who will certainly hinder them from the right way while they think they are rightly guided

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely this quran is a glory for you and your people and you will all be questioned about it

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so when they enraged us we inflicted punishment upon them drowning them all

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed the wicked will be in the torment of hell forever

ayah_ar: وَنَادَوۡاْ يَٰمَٰلِكُ لِيَقۡضِ عَلَيۡنَا رَبُّكَۖ قَالَ إِنَّكُم مَّٰكِثُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: they will cry o malik let your lord finish us off he will answer you are definitely here to stay

ayah_ar: أَمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّا لَا نَسۡمَعُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَجۡوَىٰهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَرُسُلُنَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: or do they think that we do not hear their evil thoughts and secret talks yes we do and our messengerangels are in their presence recording it all

ayah_ar: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: glorified is the lord of the heavens and the earth the lord of the throne far above what they claim

ayah_ar: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so let them indulge in falsehood and amuse themselves until they face their day which they have been warned of

ayah_ar: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: certainly we have made it a quran in arabic so perhaps you will understand

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡدٗا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: he is the one who has laid out the earth for you and set in it pathways for you so that you may find your way

ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي فَإِنَّهُۥ سَيَهۡدِينِ
label: joy
ayah_en: except the one who originated me and he will surely guide me

ayah_ar: أَهُمۡ يَقۡسِمُونَ رَحۡمَتَ رَبِّكَۚ نَحۡنُ قَسَمۡنَا بَيۡنَهُم مَّعِيشَتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَرَفَعۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ فَوۡقَ بَعۡضٖ دَرَجَٰتٖ لِّيَتَّخِذَ بَعۡضُهُم بَعۡضٗا سُخۡرِيّٗاۗ وَرَحۡمَتُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡرٞ مِّمَّا يَجۡمَعُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: is it they who distribute your lords mercy we alone have distributed their very livelihood among them in this worldly life and raised some of them in rank above others so that some may employ others in service but your lords mercy is far better than whatever wealth they amass

ayah_ar: فَٱسۡتَمۡسِكۡ بِٱلَّذِيٓ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: so hold firmly to what has been revealed to you o prophet you are truly on the straight path

ayah_ar: فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ سَلَفٗا وَمَثَلٗا لِّلۡأٓخِرِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and we made them an example and a lesson for those after them

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَعِلۡمٞ لِّلسَّاعَةِ فَلَا تَمۡتَرُنَّ بِهَا وَٱتَّبِعُونِۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: and his second coming is truly a sign for the hour so have no doubt about it and follow me this is the straight path

ayah_ar: ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ أَنتُمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجُكُمۡ تُحۡبَرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: enter paradise you and your spouses rejoicing

ayah_ar: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: that is the paradise which you will be awarded for what you used to do

ayah_ar: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: there you will have abundant fruit to eat from

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَتَيۡنِ عَظِيمٍ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and they exclaimed if only this quran was revealed to a great man from one of the two cities

ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَنَا قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكَ بُعۡدَ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقَيۡنِ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرِينُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: but when such a person comes to us one will say to their associate i wish you were as distant from me as the east is from the west what an evil associate you were

ayah_ar: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: can you make the deaf hear or guide the blind or those clearly astray

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَكُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: but as soon as he came to them with our signs they laughed at them

ayah_ar: ۞وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوۡمُكَ مِنۡهُ يَصِدُّونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: when the son of mary was cited as an example in argument your people o prophet broke into joyful applause

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَأَٰلِهَتُنَا خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ هُوَۚ مَا ضَرَبُوهُ لَكَ إِلَّا جَدَلَۢاۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٌ خَصِمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: they exclaimed which is better our gods or jesus they cite him only to argue in fact they are a people prone to dispute

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَۗ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَرِيبٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: it is allah who has revealed the book with the truth and the balance of justice you never know perhaps the hour is near

ayah_ar: وَيَعۡلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: so those who dispute about our signs may know that they have no refuge

ayah_ar: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ يَنصُرُونَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن سَبِيلٍ
label: anger
ayah_en: they will have no protectors to help them against allah and whoever allah leaves to stray for them there is no way

ayah_ar: وَمَا ٱخۡتَلَفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ فَحُكۡمُهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ أُنِيبُ
label: fear
ayah_en: say to the believers o  prophet whatever you may differ about its judgment rests with allah that is allahmy lord in him i put my trust and to him i always turn

ayah_ar: يَسۡتَعۡجِلُ بِهَا ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهَاۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مُشۡفِقُونَ مِنۡهَا وَيَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّهَا ٱلۡحَقُّۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُمَارُونَ فِي ٱلسَّاعَةِ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: those who disbelieve in it ask to hasten it mockingly but the believers are fearful of it knowing that it is the truth surely those who dispute about the hour have gone far astray

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: you can never escape him on earth nor do you have any protector or helper besides allah

ayah_ar: أَوۡ يُوبِقۡهُنَّ بِمَا كَسَبُواْ وَيَعۡفُ عَن كَثِيرٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: or he can wreck the ships for what the people have committedthough he forgives much

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡتَنِبُونَ كَبَٰٓئِرَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡفَوَٰحِشَ وَإِذَا مَا غَضِبُواْ هُمۡ يَغۡفِرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: who avoid major sins and shameful deeds and forgive when angered

ayah_ar: ٱسۡتَجِيبُواْ لِرَبِّكُم مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَ يَوۡمٞ لَّا مَرَدَّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ مَا لَكُم مِّن مَّلۡجَإٖ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّكِيرٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: respond to your lord before the coming of a day from allah that cannot be averted there will be no refuge for you then nor grounds for denial of sins

ayah_ar: صِرَٰطِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَلَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَصِيرُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ
label: fear
ayah_en: the path of allah to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth surely to allah all matters will return for judgment

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ يُوحِيٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: and so you o prophet are sent revelation just like those before you by allahthe almighty allwise

ayah_ar: لَهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: to him belong the keys of the treasuries of the heavens and the earth he gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever he wills indeed he has perfect knowledge of all things

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفُۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرۡزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ
label: joy
ayah_en: allah is ever kind to his servants he provides abundantly to whoever he wills and he is the allpowerful almighty

ayah_ar: وَيَسۡتَجِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَيَزِيدُهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦۚ وَٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: he responds to those who believe and do good and increases their reward out of his grace as for the disbelievers they will suffer a severe punishment

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡغَيۡثَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا قَنَطُواْ وَيَنشُرُ رَحۡمَتَهُۥۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡوَلِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ
label: joy
ayah_en: he is the one who sends down rain after people have given up hope spreading out his mercy he is the guardian the praiseworthy

ayah_ar: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعۡدَ ظُلۡمِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ
label: joy
ayah_en: there is no blame on those who enforce justice after being wronged

ayah_ar: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
label: joy
ayah_en: and whoever endures patiently and forgivessurely this is a resolve to aspire to

ayah_ar: لِّلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُۚ يَهَبُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ إِنَٰثٗا وَيَهَبُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ ٱلذُّكُورَ
label: joy
ayah_en: to allah alone belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth he creates whatever he wills he blesses whoever he wills with daughters and blesses whoever he wills with sons

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يَقۡبَلُ ٱلتَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَعۡفُواْ عَنِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: he is the one who accepts repentance from his servants and pardons their sins and he knows whatever you do

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَصَٰبَكُم مِّن مُّصِيبَةٖ فَبِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَيَعۡفُواْ عَن كَثِيرٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: whatever affliction befalls you is because of what your own hands have committed and he pardons much

ayah_ar: أَوۡ يُزَوِّجُهُمۡ ذُكۡرَانٗا وَإِنَٰثٗاۖ وَيَجۡعَلُ مَن يَشَآءُ عَقِيمًاۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٞ قَدِيرٞ
label: sadness
ayah_en: or grants both sons and daughters to whoever he wills and leaves whoever he wills infertile he is indeed allknowing most capable

ayah_ar: بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا فَأَعۡرَضَ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: delivering good news and warning yet most of them turn away so they do not hear

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ قُلُوبُنَا فِيٓ أَكِنَّةٖ مِّمَّا تَدۡعُونَآ إِلَيۡهِ وَفِيٓ ءَاذَانِنَا وَقۡرٞ وَمِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا وَبَيۡنِكَ حِجَابٞ فَٱعۡمَلۡ إِنَّنَا عَٰمِلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they say our hearts are veiled against what you are calling us to there is deafness in our ears and there is a barrier between us and you so do whatever you want and so shall we

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: those who do not pay almstax and are in denial of the hereafter

ayah_ar: فَإِنۡ أَعۡرَضُواْ فَقُلۡ أَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ صَٰعِقَةٗ مِّثۡلَ صَٰعِقَةِ عَادٖ وَثَمُودَ
label: anger
ayah_en: if they turn away then say o prophet i warn you of a mighty blast like the one that befell d and thamd

ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا مَا جَآءُوهَا شَهِدَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَمۡعُهُمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ وَجُلُودُهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: when they reach it their ears eyes and skin will testify against what they used to do

ayah_ar: وَمَا كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَتِرُونَ أَن يَشۡهَدَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ سَمۡعُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَبۡصَٰرُكُمۡ وَلَا جُلُودُكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن ظَنَنتُمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَعۡلَمُ كَثِيرٗا مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: you did not bother to hide yourselves from your ears eyes and skin to prevent them from testifying against you rather you assumed that allah did not know much of what you used to do

ayah_ar: فَإِن يَصۡبِرُواْ فَٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوٗى لَّهُمۡۖ وَإِن يَسۡتَعۡتِبُواْ فَمَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُعۡتَبِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: even if they endure patiently the fire will always be their home and if they beg to appease their lord they will never be allowed to

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَسۡمَعُواْ لِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَٱلۡغَوۡاْ فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَغۡلِبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: the disbelievers advised one another do not listen to this quran but drown it out so that you may prevail

ayah_ar: فَلَنُذِيقَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗا وَلَنَجۡزِيَنَّهُمۡ أَسۡوَأَ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so we will certainly make the disbelievers taste a severe punishment and we will surely repay them according to the worst of their deeds

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَهِيَ دُخَانٞ فَقَالَ لَهَا وَلِلۡأَرۡضِ ٱئۡتِيَا طَوۡعًا أَوۡ كَرۡهٗا قَالَتَآ أَتَيۡنَا طَآئِعِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: then he turned towards the heaven when it was still like smoke saying to it and to the earth submit willingly or unwillingly they both responded we submit willingly

ayah_ar: فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا صَرۡصَرٗا فِيٓ أَيَّامٖ نَّحِسَاتٖ لِّنُذِيقَهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخِزۡيِ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَخۡزَىٰۖ وَهُمۡ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so we sent against them a furious wind for several miserable days to make them taste a humiliating punishment in this worldly life but far more humiliating will be the punishment of the hereafter and they will not be helped

ayah_ar: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ نَزۡغٞ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
label: fear
ayah_en: and if you are tempted by satan then seek refuge with allah indeed he alone is the allhearing allknowing

ayah_ar: مَّنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَنۡ أَسَآءَ فَعَلَيۡهَاۗ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ
label: fear
ayah_en: whoever does good it is to their own benefit and whoever does evil it is to their own loss your lord is never unjust to his creation

ayah_ar: لَّا يَسۡـَٔمُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٞ قَنُوطٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: one never tires of praying for good and if touched with evil they become desperate and hopeless

ayah_ar: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ كَفَرۡتُم بِهِۦ مَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنۡ هُوَ فِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: ask them o  prophet imagine if this quran is truly from allah and you deny it who can be more astray than those who have gone too far in opposition to the truth

ayah_ar: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطُۢ
label: fear
ayah_en: they are truly in doubt of the meeting with their lord but he is indeed fully aware of everything

ayah_ar: تَنزِيلٞ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
label: joy
ayah_en: this is a revelation from the most compassionate most merciful

ayah_ar: كِتَٰبٞ فُصِّلَتۡ ءَايَٰتُهُۥ قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيّٗا لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: it is a book whose verses are perfectly explaineda quran in arabic for people who know

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: but those who believe and do good will certainly have a neverending reward

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ تَتَنَزَّلُ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ أَلَّا تَخَافُواْ وَلَا تَحۡزَنُواْ وَأَبۡشِرُواْ بِٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: surely those who say our lord is allah and then remain steadfast the angels descend upon them saying do not fear nor grieve rather rejoice in the good news of paradise which you have been promised

ayah_ar: نُزُلٗا مِّنۡ غَفُورٖ رَّحِيمٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: an accommodation from the allforgiving most merciful lord

ayah_ar: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ قَوۡلٗا مِّمَّن دَعَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا وَقَالَ إِنَّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and whose words are better than someone who calls others to allah does good and says i am truly one of those who submit

ayah_ar: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ
label: anger
ayah_en: and so your lords decree has been proven true against the disbelieversthat they will be the inmates of the fire

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّهُۥٓ إِذَا دُعِيَ ٱللَّهُ وَحۡدَهُۥ كَفَرۡتُمۡ وَإِن يُشۡرَكۡ بِهِۦ تُؤۡمِنُواْۚ فَٱلۡحُكۡمُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡعَلِيِّ ٱلۡكَبِيرِ
label: anger
ayah_en: they will be told no this is because when allah alone was invoked you staunchly disbelieved but when others were associated with him in worship you readily believed so today judgment belongs to allah alonethe most high allgreat

ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُواْ سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: to pharaoh haman and korah but they responded magician total liar

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُم مِّن كُلِّ مُتَكَبِّرٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
label: anger
ayah_en: moses replied i seek refuge in my lord and your lord from every arrogant person who does not believe in the day of reckoning

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُم مِّثۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ
label: anger
ayah_en: and the man who believed cautioned o my people i truly fear for you the doom of earlier enemy forces

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ يَٰهَٰمَٰنُ ٱبۡنِ لِي صَرۡحٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ أَبۡلُغُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبَ
label: anger
ayah_en: pharaoh ordered o haman build me a high tower so i may reach the pathways

ayah_ar: ٱلنَّارُ يُعۡرَضُونَ عَلَيۡهَا غُدُوّٗا وَعَشِيّٗاۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡخِلُوٓاْ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ أَشَدَّ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
label: anger
ayah_en: they are exposed to the fire in their graves morning and evening and on the day the hour will be established it will be said admit pharaohs people into the harshest punishment of hell

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ يُؤۡفَكُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: this is how those who used to reject allahs signs were also deluded

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَبِمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا بِهِۦ رُسُلَنَاۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they are the ones who reject this book and all scriptures we sent our messengers with so they will know the consequences

ayah_ar: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ قَالُواْ ضَلُّواْ عَنَّا بَل لَّمۡ نَكُن نَّدۡعُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: with allah they will cry they have all failed us in fact we did not invoke anything real before this is how allah leaves the disbelievers to stray

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡرَحُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَمۡرَحُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they will be told this punishment is for being prideful on earth unjustly and for acting arrogantly

ayah_ar: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: and he shows you his signs now which of allahs signs will you deny

ayah_ar: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوۡبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلۡعِقَابِ ذِي ٱلطَّوۡلِۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
label: fear
ayah_en: the forgiver of sin and accepter of repentance the severe in punishment and infinite in bounty there is no god worthy of worship except him to him alone  is the final return

ayah_ar: رَفِيعُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتِ ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ يُلۡقِي ٱلرُّوحَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ لِيُنذِرَ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّلَاقِ
label: fear
ayah_en: he is highly exalted in rank lord of the throne he sends down the revelation by his command to whoever he wills of his servants to warn all of the day of meeting

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ هُم بَٰرِزُونَۖ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنۡهُمۡ شَيۡءٞۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ
label: fear
ayah_en: the day all will appear before allah nothing about them will be hidden from him he will ask who does all authority belong to this day to allahthe one the supreme

ayah_ar: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡۚ لَا ظُلۡمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
label: fear
ayah_en: today every soul will be rewarded for what it has done no injustice today surely allah is swift in reckoning

ayah_ar: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓزِفَةِ إِذِ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ لَدَى ٱلۡحَنَاجِرِ كَٰظِمِينَۚ مَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَلَا شَفِيعٖ يُطَاعُ
label: fear
ayah_en: warn them o prophet of the approaching day when the hearts will jump into the throats suppressing distress the wrongdoers will have neither a close friend nor intercessor to be heard

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: the hour is certainly coming there is no doubt about it but most people do not believe

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ رَبُّكُمُ ٱدۡعُونِيٓ أَسۡتَجِبۡ لَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِي سَيَدۡخُلُونَ جَهَنَّمَ دَاخِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: your lord has proclaimed call upon me i will respond to you surely those who are too proud to worship me will enter hell fully humbled

ayah_ar: إِذِ ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلُ فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ وَٱلسَّلَٰسِلُ يُسۡحَبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: when shackles will be around their necks and chains on their legs they will be dragged

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: then they will be asked where are those idols you used to associate

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡاْ بَأۡسَنَا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَحۡدَهُۥ وَكَفَرۡنَا بِمَا كُنَّا بِهِۦ مُشۡرِكِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: when they saw our punishment they cried now we believe in allah alone and reject what we had been associating with him

ayah_ar: وَقِهِمُ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ وَمَن تَقِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَقَدۡ رَحِمۡتَهُۥۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: and protect them from the consequences of their evil deeds for whoever you protect from the evil of their deeds on that day will have been shown your mercy that is truly the ultimate triumph

ayah_ar: مَنۡ عَمِلَ سَيِّئَةٗ فَلَا يُجۡزَىٰٓ إِلَّا مِثۡلَهَاۖ وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ يُرۡزَقُونَ فِيهَا بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: whoever does an evil deed will only be paid back with its equivalent and whoever does good whether male or female and is a believer they will enter paradise where they will be provided for without limit

ayah_ar: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لِذَنۢبِكَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ وَٱلۡإِبۡكَٰرِ
label: joy
ayah_en: so be patient o prophet for allahs promise is certainly true seek forgiveness for your shortcomings and glorify the praises of your lord morning and evening

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: that is allah your lord the creator of all things there is no god worthy of worship except him how can you then be deluded from the truth

ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ فَإِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
label: joy
ayah_en: he is the one who gives life and causes death when he decrees a matter he simply tells it be and it is

ayah_ar: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَلِتَبۡلُغُواْ عَلَيۡهَا حَاجَةٗ فِي صُدُورِكُمۡ وَعَلَيۡهَا وَعَلَى ٱلۡفُلۡكِ تُحۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: also you find in them other benefits and by means of them you may reach destinations you desire and you are carried upon some of them and upon ships

ayah_ar: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: o  my people i truly fear for you the day all will be crying out to each other

ayah_ar: يَوۡمَ تُوَلُّونَ مُدۡبِرِينَ مَا لَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ عَاصِمٖۗ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: the day you will try in vain to turn your backs and run away with no one to protect you from allah and whoever allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide

ayah_ar: ۞وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَا لِيٓ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: o  my people how is it that i invite you to salvation while you invite me to the fire

ayah_ar: فَسَتَذۡكُرُونَ مَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمۡۚ وَأُفَوِّضُ أَمۡرِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَصِيرُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: you will remember what i say to you and i entrust my affairs to allah surely allah is allseeing of all his servants

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ لِخَزَنَةِ جَهَنَّمَ ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ يُخَفِّفۡ عَنَّا يَوۡمٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and those in the fire will cry out to the keepers of hell pray to your lord to lighten the torment for us even for one day

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أَنَّىٰ يُصۡرَفُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: have you not seen how those who dispute allahs signs are turned away

ayah_ar: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: say i am commanded to worship allah being sincerely devoted to him alone

ayah_ar: أَفَمَنۡ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ
label: anger
ayah_en: what about those against whom the decree of torment has been justified is it you o prophet who will then save those bound for the fire

ayah_ar: وَمَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّۗ أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٖ ذِي ٱنتِقَامٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: and whoever allah guides none can lead astray is allah not almighty capable of punishment

ayah_ar: مَن يَأۡتِيهِ عَذَابٞ يُخۡزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيۡهِ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٌ
label: anger
ayah_en: who will be visited by a humiliating torment in this life and overwhelmed by an everlasting punishment in the next

ayah_ar: قَدۡ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: the same had already been said by those destroyed before them but their worldly gains were of no benefit to them

ayah_ar: قُلۡ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأۡمُرُوٓنِّيٓ أَعۡبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: say o prophet are you urging me to worship anyone other than allah o  ignorant ones

ayah_ar: لَهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ ظُلَلٞ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحۡتِهِمۡ ظُلَلٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥۚ يَٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ
label: fear
ayah_en: they will have layers of fire above and below them that is what allah warns his servants with so fear me o  my servants

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡحَدِيثِ كِتَٰبٗا مُّتَشَٰبِهٗا مَّثَانِيَ تَقۡشَعِرُّ مِنۡهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمۡ وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِي بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is allah who has sent down the best messagea book of perfect consistency and repeated lessonswhich causes the skin and hearts of those who fear their lord to tremble then their skin and hearts soften at the mention of the mercy of allah that is the guidance of allah through which he guides whoever he wills but whoever allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡحَدِيثِ كِتَٰبٗا مُّتَشَٰبِهٗا مَّثَانِيَ تَقۡشَعِرُّ مِنۡهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمۡ وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِي بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is allah who has sent down the best messagea book of perfect consistency and repeated lessonswhich causes the skin and hearts of those who fear their lord to tremble then their skin and hearts soften at the mention of the mercy of allah that is the guidance of allah through which he guides whoever he wills but whoever allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide

ayah_ar: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخِزۡيَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so allah made them taste humiliation in this worldly life but far worse is the punishment of the hereafter if only they knew

ayah_ar: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is a quran revealed in arabic without any crookedness so perhaps they will be conscious of allah

ayah_ar: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٞ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: you o prophet will certainly die and they will die too

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: then on the day of judgment you will all settle your dispute before your lord

ayah_ar: وَأَنِيبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ وَأَسۡلِمُواْ لَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: turn to your lord in repentance and fully submit to him before the punishment reaches you for then you will not be helped

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: rather worship allah alone and be one of the grateful

ayah_ar: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: it will be said to them enter the gates of hell to stay there forever what an evil home for the arrogant

ayah_ar: قُلۡ يَٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٞۗ وَأَرۡضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّٰبِرُونَ أَجۡرَهُم بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: say o prophet that allah says o my servants who believe be mindful of your lord those who do good in this world will have a good reward and allahs earth is spacious only those who endure patiently will be given their reward without limit
