ayah_ar: وَإِذَا قَرَأۡتَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ جَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَكَ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ حِجَابٗا مَّسۡتُورٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: when you o prophet recite the quran we put a hidden barrier between you and those who do not believe in the hereafter

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ يَبۡتَغُونَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمُ ٱلۡوَسِيلَةَ أَيُّهُمۡ أَقۡرَبُ وَيَرۡجُونَ رَحۡمَتَهُۥ وَيَخَافُونَ عَذَابَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ كَانَ مَحۡذُورٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: even the closest to allah of those invoked would be seeking a way to their lord hoping for his mercy and fearing his punishment indeed your lords torment is fearsome

ayah_ar: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٞۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ وَكِيلٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: allah added you will truly have no authority over my faithful servants and sufficient is your lord as a guardian

ayah_ar: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: had it not been for the mercy of your lord indeed his favour upon you is immense

ayah_ar: وَقُرۡءَانٗا فَرَقۡنَٰهُ لِتَقۡرَأَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ مُكۡثٖ وَنَزَّلۡنَٰهُ تَنزِيلٗا
label: joy
ayah_en: it is a quran we have revealed in stages so that you may recite it to people at a deliberate pace and we have sent it down in successive revelations

ayah_ar: وَيَخِرُّونَ لِلۡأَذۡقَانِ يَبۡكُونَ وَيَزِيدُهُمۡ خُشُوعٗا۩
label: joy
ayah_en: and they fall down upon their faces weeping and it increases them in humility

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: and it warns those who do not believe in the hereafter that we have prepared for them a painful punishment

ayah_ar: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرۡ تَبۡذِيرًا
label: sadness
ayah_en: give to close relatives their due as well as the poor and needy travellers and do not spend wastefully

ayah_ar: وَإِمَّا تُعۡرِضَنَّ عَنۡهُمُ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ رَحۡمَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكَ تَرۡجُوهَا فَقُل لَّهُمۡ قَوۡلٗا مَّيۡسُورٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: but if you must turn them down because you lack the means to givewhile hoping to receive your lords bountythen at least give them a kind word

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَقۡتُلُوٓاْ أَوۡلَٰدَكُمۡ خَشۡيَةَ إِمۡلَٰقٖۖ نَّحۡنُ نَرۡزُقُهُمۡ وَإِيَّاكُمۡۚ إِنَّ قَتۡلَهُمۡ كَانَ خِطۡـٔٗا كَبِيرٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: do not kill your children for fear of poverty we provide for them and for you surely killing them is a heinous sin

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ مَالَ ٱلۡيَتِيمِ إِلَّا بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ حَتَّىٰ يَبۡلُغَ أَشُدَّهُۥۚ وَأَوۡفُواْ بِٱلۡعَهۡدِۖ إِنَّ ٱلۡعَهۡدَ كَانَ مَسۡـُٔولٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: do not come near the wealth of the orphanunless intending to enhance ituntil they attain maturity honour your pledges for you will surely be accountable for them

ayah_ar: قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: say sufficient is allah as a witness between me and you he is certainly allknowing allseeing of his servants

ayah_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِن كَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفۡعُولٗا
label: sadness
ayah_en: and say glory be to our lord surely the promise of our lord has been fulfilled

ayah_ar: إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مُّنكِرَةٞ وَهُم مُّسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: your god is only one god as for those who do not believe in the hereafter their hearts are in denial and they are too proud

ayah_ar: فَٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَلَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so enter the gates of hell to stay there forever indeed what an evil home for the arrogant

ayah_ar: إِن تَحۡرِصۡ عَلَىٰ هُدَىٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَن يُضِلُّۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: even though you o prophet are keen on their guidance allah certainly does not guide those he leaves to stray and they will have no helpers

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَا قَوۡلُنَا لِشَيۡءٍ إِذَآ أَرَدۡنَٰهُ أَن نَّقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
label: anger
ayah_en: if we ever will something to exist all we say is be and it is

ayah_ar: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ تَخَوُّفٖ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ
label: anger
ayah_en: or that he will not destroy them gradually but your lord is truly ever gracious most merciful

ayah_ar: وَمَا بِكُم مِّن نِّعۡمَةٖ فَمِنَ ٱللَّهِۖ ثُمَّ إِذَا مَسَّكُمُ ٱلضُّرُّ فَإِلَيۡهِ تَجۡـَٔرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: whatever blessings you have are from allah then whenever hardship touches you to him alone you cry for help

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِذَا كَشَفَ ٱلضُّرَّ عَنكُمۡ إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنكُم بِرَبِّهِمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: then as soon as he removes the hardship from you a group of you associates others with their lord in worship

ayah_ar: يَتَوَٰرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ مِن سُوٓءِ مَا بُشِّرَ بِهِۦٓۚ أَيُمۡسِكُهُۥ عَلَىٰ هُونٍ أَمۡ يَدُسُّهُۥ فِي ٱلتُّرَابِۗ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: he hides himself from the people because of the bad news he has received should he keep her in disgrace or bury her alive in the ground evil indeed is their judgment

ayah_ar: لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مَثَلُ ٱلسَّوۡءِۖ وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَثَلُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
label: anger
ayah_en: to those who disbelieve in the hereafter belong all evil qualities whereas to allah belong the finest attributes and he is the almighty allwise

ayah_ar: يَعۡرِفُونَ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنكِرُونَهَا وَأَكۡثَرُهُمُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they are aware of allahs favours but still deny them and most of them are truly ungrateful

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَءَا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: and when the wrongdoers face the punishment it will not be lightened for them nor will they be delayed from it

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَا يَفۡتَرِي ٱلۡكَذِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَٰذِبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: no one fabricates lies except those who disbelieve in allahs revelations and it is they who are the true liars

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱسۡتَحَبُّواْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا عَلَى ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: this is because they prefer the life of this world over the hereafter surely allah never guides those who choose to disbelieve

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَسَمۡعِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰفِلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they are the ones whose hearts ears and eyes are sealed by allah and it is they who are truly heedless

ayah_ar: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: the command of allah is at hand so do not hasten it glorified and exalted is he above what they associate with him in worship

ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: he created humans from a spermdrop thenbeholdthey openly challenge him

ayah_ar: وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ قَصۡدُ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمِنۡهَا جَآئِرٞۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is upon allah alone to clearly show the straight way other ways are deviant had he willed he would have easily imposed guidance upon all of you

ayah_ar: وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَأَنۡهَٰرٗا وَسُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: he has placed into the earth firm mountains so it does not shake with you as well as rivers and pathways so you may find your way

ayah_ar: أَمۡوَٰتٌ غَيۡرُ أَحۡيَآءٖۖ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: they are dead not alivenot even knowing when their followers will be resurrected

ayah_ar: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: or that he will not seize them while they go about their day for then they will have no escape

ayah_ar: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ۩
label: fear
ayah_en: they fear their lord above them and do whatever they are commanded

ayah_ar: وَلَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلدِّينُ وَاصِبًاۚ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَتَّقُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: to him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth and to him alone is the everlasting devotion will you then fear any other than allah

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّاسَ بِظُلۡمِهِم مَّا تَرَكَ عَلَيۡهَا مِن دَآبَّةٖ وَلَٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ سَاعَةٗ وَلَا يَسۡتَقۡدِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: if allah were to punish people immediately for their wrongdoing he would not have left a single living being on earth but he delays them for an appointed term and when their time arrives they cannot delay it for a moment nor could they advance it

ayah_ar: فَلَا تَضۡرِبُواْ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so do not set up equals to allah for allah certainly knows and you do not know

ayah_ar: وَلِلَّهِ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَآ أَمۡرُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ إِلَّا كَلَمۡحِ ٱلۡبَصَرِ أَوۡ هُوَ أَقۡرَبُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: to allah alone belongs the knowledge of the unseen in the heavens and the earth bringing about the hour would only take the blink of an eye or even less surely allah is most capable of everything

ayah_ar: وَيَوۡمَ نَبۡعَثُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ شَهِيدٗا ثُمَّ لَا يُؤۡذَنُ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: consider o  prophet the day we will call a prophet as a witness from every faithcommunity then the disbelievers will neither be allowed to plead nor appease their lord

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡتَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ ٱلرَّجِيمِ
label: fear
ayah_en: when you recite the quran seek refuge with allah from satan the accursed

ayah_ar: ٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ سَبِيلِ رَبِّكَ بِٱلۡحِكۡمَةِ وَٱلۡمَوۡعِظَةِ ٱلۡحَسَنَةِۖ وَجَٰدِلۡهُم بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: invite all to the way of your lord with wisdom and kind advice and only debate with them in the best manner surely your lord alone knows best who has strayed from his way and who is rightly guided

ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ تَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: he created the heavens and the earth for a purpose exalted is he above what they associate with him in worship

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ خَلَقَهَاۖ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا دِفۡءٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and he created the cattle for you as a source of warmth food and many other benefits

ayah_ar: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسۡرَحُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: they are also pleasing to you when you bring them home and when you take them out to graze

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡخَيۡلَ وَٱلۡبِغَالَ وَٱلۡحَمِيرَ لِتَرۡكَبُوهَا وَزِينَةٗۚ وَيَخۡلُقُ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: he also created horses mules and donkeys for your transportation and adornment and he creates what you do not know

ayah_ar: وَمَا ذَرَأَ لَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and he subjected for you whatever he has created on earth of varying colours surely in this is a sign for those who are mindful

ayah_ar: ۞وَقِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ مَاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمۡۚ قَالُواْ خَيۡرٗاۗ لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٞۚ وَلَدَارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ خَيۡرٞۚ وَلَنِعۡمَ دَارُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and when it is said to those mindful of allah what has your lord revealed they say all the best for those who do good in this world there is goodness but far better is the eternal home of the hereafter how excellent indeed is the home of the righteous

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُواْ فِي ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا ظُلِمُواْ لَنُبَوِّئَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٗۖ وَلَأَجۡرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: as for those who emigrated in the cause of allah after being persecuted we will surely bless them with a good home in this world but the reward of the hereafter is far better if only they knew

ayah_ar: بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلزُّبُرِۗ وَأَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلذِّكۡرَ لِتُبَيِّنَ لِلنَّاسِ مَا نُزِّلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: we sent them with clear proofs and divine books and we have sent down to you o prophet the reminder so that you may explain to people what has been revealed for them and perhaps they will reflect

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا لِتُبَيِّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي ٱخۡتَلَفُواْ فِيهِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: we have revealed to you the book only to clarify for them what they differed about and as a guide and mercy for those who believe

ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ أَخۡرَجَكُم مِّنۢ بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and allah brought you out of the wombs of your mothers while you knew nothing and gave you hearing sight and intellect so perhaps you would be thankful

ayah_ar: وَأَلۡقَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلسَّلَمَۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: they will offer full submission to allah on that day and whatever gods they fabricated will fail them

ayah_ar: مَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَنُحۡيِيَنَّهُۥ حَيَوٰةٗ طَيِّبَةٗۖ وَلَنَجۡزِيَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡرَهُم بِأَحۡسَنِ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: whoever does good whether male or female and is a believer we will surely bless them with a good life and we will certainly reward them according to the best of their deeds

ayah_ar: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗا وَٱشۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ إِيَّاهُ تَعۡبُدُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: so eat from the good lawful things which allah has provided for you and be grateful for allahs favours if you truly worship him alone

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِينَ عَمِلُواْ ٱلسُّوٓءَ بِجَهَٰلَةٖ ثُمَّ تَابُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصۡلَحُوٓاْ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهَا لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: as for those who commit evil ignorantly or recklessly then repent afterwards and mend their ways then your lord is surely allforgiving most merciful

ayah_ar: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: but if they turn away then your duty o prophet is only to deliver the message clearly

ayah_ar: ۞يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ تُجَٰدِلُ عَن نَّفۡسِهَا وَتُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: consider the day when every soul will come pleading for itself and each will be paid in full for what it did and none will be wronged

ayah_ar: وَٱصۡبِرۡ وَمَا صَبۡرُكَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِۚ وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُ فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: be patient o prophet for your patience is only with allahs help do not grieve over those who disbelieve nor be distressed by their schemes

ayah_ar: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: they say o you to whom the reminder is revealed you must be insane

ayah_ar: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but no messenger ever came to them without being mocked

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَابٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّواْ فِيهِ يَعۡرُجُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: and even if we opened for them a gate to heaven through which they continued to ascend

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: and we made in it means of sustenance for you and others who you do not provide for

ayah_ar: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
label: anger
ayah_en: as for the jinn we created them earlier from smokeless fire

ayah_ar: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but not iblis who refused to prostrate with the others

ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: allah asked o iblis what is the matter with you that you did not join others in prostration

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَٱخۡرُجۡ مِنۡهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: allah commanded then get out of paradise for you are truly cursed

ayah_ar: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: he said o my people here are my daughters so marry them if you wish to do so

ayah_ar: لَعَمۡرُكَ إِنَّهُمۡ لَفِي سَكۡرَتِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: by your life o prophet they certainly wandered blindly intoxicated by lust

ayah_ar: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ مُشۡرِقِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so the mighty blast overtook them at sunrise

ayah_ar: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ وَإِنَّهُمَا لَبِإِمَامٖ مُّبِينٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: so we inflicted punishment upon them the ruins of both nations still lie on a wellknown road

ayah_ar: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so by your lord we will certainly question them all

ayah_ar: فَٱصۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so proclaim what you have been commanded and turn away from the polytheists

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: who set up other gods with allah they will soon come to know

ayah_ar: مَّا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: no people can advance their doom nor can they delay it

ayah_ar: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: they would not believe in this quran despite the many examples of those destroyed before

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: except the one eavesdropping who is then pursued by a visible flare

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَقۡدِمِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَـٔۡخِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: we certainly know those who have gone before you and those who will come after you

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely your lord alone will gather them together for judgment he is truly allwise allknowing

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed we created man from sounding clay moulded from black mud

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so when i have fashioned him and had a spirit of my own creation breathed into him fall down in prostration to him

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so when i have fashioned him and had a spirit of my own creation breathed into him fall down in prostration to him

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوۡعِدُهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and surely hell is their destined place all together

ayah_ar: لَهَا سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡوَٰبٖ لِّكُلِّ بَابٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ جُزۡءٞ مَّقۡسُومٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: it has seven gates to each a group of them is designated

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّ عَذَابِي هُوَ ٱلۡعَذَابُ ٱلۡأَلِيمُ
label: fear
ayah_en: and that my torment is indeed the most painful

ayah_ar: وَقَضَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقۡطُوعٞ مُّصۡبِحِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: we revealed to him this decree those sinners will be uprooted in the morning

ayah_ar: فَجَعَلۡنَا عَٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةٗ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
label: fear
ayah_en: and we turned the cities of sodom and gomorrah upside down and rained upon them stones of baked clay

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُتَوَسِّمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely in this are signs for those who contemplate

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely in this is a sign for those who believe

ayah_ar: فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and all they achieved was of no help to them

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ جَعَلۡنَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed we have placed constellations in the sky and adorned it for all to see

ayah_ar: ٱدۡخُلُوهَا بِسَلَٰمٍ ءَامِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: it will be said to them enter in peace and security

ayah_ar: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: no fatigue will touch them there nor will they ever be asked to leave

ayah_ar: ۞نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: inform my servants o prophet that i am truly the allforgiving most merciful

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِي عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: he wondered do you give me good news despite my old age what unlikely news

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ
label: joy
ayah_en: we have certainly granted you the seven oftenrepeated verses and the great quran

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَفَيۡنَٰكَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَهۡزِءِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: surely we will be sufficient for you against the mockers

ayah_ar: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: so glorify the praises of your lord and be one of those who always pray

ayah_ar: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: the day will come when the disbelievers will certainly wish they had submitted to allah

ayah_ar: لَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتۡ أَبۡصَٰرُنَا بَلۡ نَحۡنُ قَوۡمٞ مَّسۡحُورُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: still they would say our eyes have truly been dazzled in fact we must have been bewitched

ayah_ar: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: he exclaimed who would despair of the mercy of their lord except the misguided

ayah_ar: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: lot pleaded indeed these are my guests so do not embarrass me

ayah_ar: وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخۡزُونِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: fear allah and do not humiliate me

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدۡرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: we certainly know that your heart is truly distressed by what they say

ayah_ar: وَٱعۡبُدۡ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡتِيَكَ ٱلۡيَقِينُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and worship your lord until the inevitable comes your way

ayah_ar: وَمَثَلُ كَلِمَةٍ خَبِيثَةٖ كَشَجَرَةٍ خَبِيثَةٍ ٱجۡتُثَّتۡ مِن فَوۡقِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَا لَهَا مِن قَرَارٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: and the parable of an evil word is that of an evil tree uprooted from the earth having no stability

ayah_ar: ۞أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ بَدَّلُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ كُفۡرٗا وَأَحَلُّواْ قَوۡمَهُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡبَوَارِ
label: anger
ayah_en: have you not seen those disbelievers who meet allahs favours with ingratitude and lead their own people to their doom

ayah_ar: وَقَدۡ مَكَرُواْ مَكۡرَهُمۡ وَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ مَكۡرُهُمۡ وَإِن كَانَ مَكۡرُهُمۡ لِتَزُولَ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ
label: anger
ayah_en: they devised every plot which was fully known to allah but their plotting was not enough to even overpower mountains let alone allah

ayah_ar: مُهۡطِعِينَ مُقۡنِعِي رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَا يَرۡتَدُّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ طَرۡفُهُمۡۖ وَأَفۡـِٔدَتُهُمۡ هَوَآءٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: rushing forth heads raised never blinking hearts void

ayah_ar: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ
label: fear
ayah_en: with garments of tar and their faces covered with flames

ayah_ar: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ كُلَّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
label: fear
ayah_en: as such allah will reward every soul for what it has committed surely allah is swift in reckoning

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِن تَكۡفُرُوٓاْ أَنتُمۡ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: moses added if you along with everyone on earth were to be ungrateful then know that allah is indeed selfsufficient praiseworthy

ayah_ar: وَءَاتَىٰكُم مِّن كُلِّ مَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُۚ وَإِن تَعُدُّواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحۡصُوهَآۗ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَظَلُومٞ كَفَّارٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: and he has granted you all that you asked him for if you tried to count allahs blessings you would never be able to number them indeed humankind is truly unfair totally ungrateful

ayah_ar: وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدَ ءَامِنٗا وَٱجۡنُبۡنِي وَبَنِيَّ أَن نَّعۡبُدَ ٱلۡأَصۡنَامَ
label: joy
ayah_en: remember when abraham prayed my lord make this city of mecca secure and keep me and my children away from the worship of idols

ayah_ar: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ
label: joy
ayah_en: our lord forgive me my parents and the believers on the day when the judgment will come to pass

ayah_ar: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: so do not think o prophet that allah will fail to keep his promise to his messengers allah is indeed almighty capable of punishment

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا بَلَٰغٞ لِّلنَّاسِ وَلِيُنذَرُواْ بِهِۦ وَلِيَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞ وَلِيَذَّكَّرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
label: joy
ayah_en: this quran is a sufficient message for humanity so that they may take it as a warning and know that there is only one god and so that people of reason may be mindful

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدِ ٱسۡتُهۡزِئَ بِرُسُلٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ فَأَمۡلَيۡتُ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُهُمۡۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ
label: anger
ayah_en: other messengers had already been ridiculed before you but i delayed the disbelievers for a while then seized them and how horrible was my punishment

ayah_ar: لَّهُمۡ عَذَابٞ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَقُّۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَاقٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: for them is punishment in this worldly life but the punishment of the hereafter is truly far worse and none can shield them from allah

ayah_ar: سَوَآءٞ مِّنكُم مَّنۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ وَمَن جَهَرَ بِهِۦ وَمَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡتَخۡفِۭ بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَسَارِبُۢ بِٱلنَّهَارِ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is the same to him whether any of you speaks secretly or openly whether one hides in the darkness of night or goes about in broad daylight

ayah_ar: يَمۡحُواْ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيُثۡبِتُۖ وَعِندَهُۥٓ أُمُّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ
label: fear
ayah_en: allah eliminates and confirms what he wills and with him is the master record

ayah_ar: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا نَأۡتِي ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنۡ أَطۡرَافِهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ لَا مُعَقِّبَ لِحُكۡمِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
label: fear
ayah_en: do they not see that we gradually reduce their land from its borders allah decidesnone can reverse his decision and he is swift in reckoning

ayah_ar: وَقَدۡ مَكَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَكۡرُ جَمِيعٗاۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖۗ وَسَيَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡكُفَّٰرُ لِمَنۡ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ
label: fear
ayah_en: those disbelievers before them secretly planned but allah has the ultimate plan he knows what every soul commits and the disbelievers will soon know who will have the ultimate outcome

ayah_ar: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَسۡتَ مُرۡسَلٗاۚ قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ وَمَنۡ عِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ
label: fear
ayah_en: the disbelievers say you muhammad are no messenger say o prophet allah is sufficient as a witness between me and you as is whoever has knowledge of the scripture

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَحۡمِلُ كُلُّ أُنثَىٰ وَمَا تَغِيضُ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامُ وَمَا تَزۡدَادُۚ وَكُلُّ شَيۡءٍ عِندَهُۥ بِمِقۡدَارٍ
label: joy
ayah_en: allah knows what every female bears and what increases and decreases in the wombs and with him everything is determined with precision

ayah_ar: وَلِلَّهِۤ يَسۡجُدُۤ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ طَوۡعٗا وَكَرۡهٗا وَظِلَٰلُهُم بِٱلۡغُدُوِّ وَٱلۡأٓصَالِ۩
label: joy
ayah_en: to allah alone bow down in submission all those in the heavens and the earthwillingly or unwillinglyas do their shadows morning and evening

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَصِلُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ وَيَخَافُونَ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
label: joy
ayah_en: and those who maintain whatever ties allah has ordered to be maintained stand in awe of their lord and fear strict judgment

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَنفَقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ سِرّٗا وَعَلَانِيَةٗ وَيَدۡرَءُونَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ
label: joy
ayah_en: and they are those who endure patiently seeking their lords pleasure establish prayer donate from what we have provided for themsecretly and openlyand respond to evil with good it is they who will have the ultimate abode

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ وَفَرِحُواْ بِٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِلَّا مَتَٰعٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: allah gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever he wills and the disbelievers become prideful of the pleasures of this worldly life but the life of this world compared to the hereafter is nothing but a fleeting enjoyment

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَطۡمَئِنُّ قُلُوبُهُم بِذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۗ أَلَا بِذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ تَطۡمَئِنُّ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ
label: joy
ayah_en: those who believe and whose hearts find comfort in the remembrance of allah surely in the remembrance of allah do hearts find comfort

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَنقُضُونَ ٱلۡمِيثَٰقَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: they are those who honour allahs covenant never breaking the pledge

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ يَأۡتِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَامٞ فِيهِ يُغَاثُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعۡصِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: then after that will come a year in which people will receive abundant rain and they will press oil and wine

ayah_ar: وَكَأَيِّن مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَمُرُّونَ عَلَيۡهَا وَهُمۡ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: how many signs in the heavens and the earth do they pass by with indifference

ayah_ar: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: and most of them do not believe in allah without associating others with him in worship

ayah_ar: قَالَ بَلۡ سَوَّلَتۡ لَكُمۡ أَنفُسُكُمۡ أَمۡرٗاۖ فَصَبۡرٞ جَمِيلٌۖ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَأۡتِيَنِي بِهِمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
label: fear
ayah_en: he cried no your souls must have tempted you to do something evil so i am left with nothing but beautiful patience i trust allah will return them all to me surely he alone is the allknowing allwise

ayah_ar: أَفَأَمِنُوٓاْ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُمۡ غَٰشِيَةٞ مِّنۡ عَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: do they feel secure that an overwhelming torment from allah will not overtake them or that the hour will not take them by surprise when they least expect it

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: indeed we have sent it down as an arabic quran

ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنِّي حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: joseph proposed put me in charge of the storehouses of the land for i am truly reliable and adept

ayah_ar: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَتَبَوَّأُ مِنۡهَا حَيۡثُ يَشَآءُۚ نُصِيبُ بِرَحۡمَتِنَا مَن نَّشَآءُۖ وَلَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: this is how we established joseph in the land to settle wherever he pleased we shower our mercy on whoever we will and we never discount the reward of the gooddoers

ayah_ar: قَالَ لَا تَثۡرِيبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ يَغۡفِرُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: joseph said there is no blame on you today may allah forgive you he is the most merciful of the merciful

ayah_ar: ۞رَبِّ قَدۡ ءَاتَيۡتَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ وَعَلَّمۡتَنِي مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِۚ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَنتَ وَلِيِّۦ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ تَوَفَّنِي مُسۡلِمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: my lord you have surely granted me authority and taught me the interpretation of dreams o originator of the heavens and the earth you are my guardian in this world and the hereafter allow me to die as one who submits and join me with the righteous

ayah_ar: قُلۡ هَٰذِهِۦ سَبِيلِيٓ أَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ عَلَىٰ بَصِيرَةٍ أَنَا۠ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَنِيۖ وَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: say o prophet this is my way i invite to allah with insighti and those who follow me glory be to allah and i am not one of the polytheists

ayah_ar: إِذۡ قَالُواْ لَيُوسُفُ وَأَخُوهُ أَحَبُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِينَا مِنَّا وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّ أَبَانَا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ
label: sadness
ayah_en: remember when they said to one another surely joseph and his brother benjamin are more beloved to our father than we even though we are a group of so many indeed our father is clearly mistaken

ayah_ar: أَرۡسِلۡهُ مَعَنَا غَدٗا يَرۡتَعۡ وَيَلۡعَبۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: send him out with us tomorrow so that he may enjoy himself and play and we will really watch over him

ayah_ar: قَالَ إِنِّي لَيَحۡزُنُنِيٓ أَن تَذۡهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَخَافُ أَن يَأۡكُلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَأَنتُمۡ عَنۡهُ غَٰفِلُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: he responded it would truly sadden me if you took him away with you and i fear that a wolf may devour him while you are negligent of him

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ بَدَا لَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَيَسۡجُنُنَّهُۥ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and so it occurred to those in charge despite seeing all the proofs of his innocence that he should be imprisoned for a while

ayah_ar: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: o  my fellowprisoners which is far better many different lords or allahthe one the supreme

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِي نَجَا مِنۡهُمَا وَٱدَّكَرَ بَعۡدَ أُمَّةٍ أَنَا۠ أُنَبِّئُكُم بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦ فَأَرۡسِلُونِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: finally the surviving exprisoner remembered joseph after a long time and said i will tell you its interpretation so send me forth to joseph

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ يَأۡتِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ سَبۡعٞ شِدَادٞ يَأۡكُلۡنَ مَا قَدَّمۡتُمۡ لَهُنَّ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا مِّمَّا تُحۡصِنُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: then after that will come seven years of great hardship which will consume whatever you have saved except the little you will store for seed

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ لِيَعۡلَمَ أَنِّي لَمۡ أَخُنۡهُ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي كَيۡدَ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: from this joseph should know that i did not speak dishonestly about him in his absence for allah certainly does not guide the scheming of the dishonest

ayah_ar: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَأۡتُونِي بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيۡلَ لَكُمۡ عِندِي وَلَا تَقۡرَبُونِ
label: sadness
ayah_en: but if you do not bring him to me next time i will have no grain for you nor will you ever come close to me again

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا جِئۡنَا لِنُفۡسِدَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كُنَّا سَٰرِقِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: josephs brothers replied by allah you know well that we did not come to cause trouble in the land nor are we thieves

ayah_ar: يَٰبَنِيَّ ٱذۡهَبُواْ فَتَحَسَّسُواْ مِن يُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ وَلَا تَاْيۡـَٔسُواْ مِن رَّوۡحِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يَاْيۡـَٔسُ مِن رَّوۡحِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: o  my sons go and search diligently for joseph and his brother and do not lose hope in the mercy of allah for no one loses hope in allahs mercy except those with no faith

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِنَّكَ لَأَنتَ يُوسُفُۖ قَالَ أَنَا۠ يُوسُفُ وَهَٰذَآ أَخِيۖ قَدۡ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَتَّقِ وَيَصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: they replied in shock are you really joseph he said i am joseph and here is my brother benjamin allah has truly been gracious to us surely whoever is mindful of allah and patient then certainly allah never discounts the reward of the gooddoers

ayah_ar: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا ٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا خَٰطِـِٔينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: they begged o our father pray for the forgiveness of our sins we have certainly been sinful

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and most people will not believeno matter how keen you are

ayah_ar: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: o  my people who would protect me from allah if i were to dismiss them will you not then be mindful

ayah_ar: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ عَادٗا كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّعَادٖ قَوۡمِ هُودٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: they were followed by a curse in this world as they will be on the day of judgment surely ad denied their lord so away with ad the people of hd

ayah_ar: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ثَمُودَاْ كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّثَمُودَ
label: anger
ayah_en: as if they had never lived there surely thamd denied their lord so away with thamd

ayah_ar: يَقۡدُمُ قَوۡمَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡوِرۡدُ ٱلۡمَوۡرُودُ
label: anger
ayah_en: he will be before his people on the day of judgment and will lead them into the fire what an evil place to be led into

ayah_ar: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنَّا عَٰمِلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: say to those who disbelieve persist in your ways we will certainly persist in ours

ayah_ar: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَقۡنَٰهُ نَعۡمَآءَ بَعۡدَ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتۡهُ لَيَقُولَنَّ ذَهَبَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتُ عَنِّيٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَفَرِحٞ فَخُورٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: but if we give them a taste of prosperity after being touched with adversity they say my ills are gone and become totally prideful and boastful

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَيۡسَ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِلَّا ٱلنَّارُۖ وَحَبِطَ مَا صَنَعُواْ فِيهَا وَبَٰطِلٞ مَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: it is they who will have nothing in the hereafter except the fire their efforts in this life will be fruitless and their deeds will be useless

ayah_ar: قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَأۡتِيكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ إِن شَآءَ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: he responded it is allah who can bring it upon you if he wills and then you will have no escape

ayah_ar: فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ مَن يَأۡتِيهِ عَذَابٞ يُخۡزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيۡهِ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: you will soon come to know who will be visited by a humiliating torment in this life and overwhelmed by an everlasting punishment in the next

ayah_ar: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِحَفِيظٖ
label: fear
ayah_en: what is left as a lawful gain by allah is far better for you if you are truly believers and i am not a keeper over you

ayah_ar: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِۦ لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ بِئۡسَ ٱلرِّفۡدُ ٱلۡمَرۡفُودُ
label: fear
ayah_en: they were followed by a curse in this life and will receive another on the day of judgment what an evil gift to receive

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيۡكَۖ مِنۡهَا قَآئِمٞ وَحَصِيدٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: these are accounts we relate to you o prophet of the destroyed cities some are still standing barren while others have been mowed down

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّمَنۡ خَافَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّجۡمُوعٞ لَّهُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّشۡهُودٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely in this is a sign for those who fear the torment of the hereafter that is a day for which humanity will be gathered and a day that will be witnessed by all

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ كُلّٗا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمۡ رَبُّكَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: and surely your lord will fully pay all for their deeds he is certainly allaware of what they do

ayah_ar: فَٱسۡتَقِمۡ كَمَآ أُمِرۡتَ وَمَن تَابَ مَعَكَ وَلَا تَطۡغَوۡاْۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: so be steadfast as you are commanded o prophet along with those who turn in submission to allah with you and do not transgress surely he is allseeing of what you believers do

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَۚ وَلِذَٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمۡۗ وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: except those shown mercy by your lordand so he created them to choose freely and so the word of your lord will be fulfilled i will surely fill up hell with jinn and humans all together

ayah_ar: وَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنَّا مُنتَظِرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and wait surely we too are waiting

ayah_ar: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and his wife was standing by so she laughed then we gave her good news of the birth of isaac and after him jacob

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓاْ أَتَعۡجَبِينَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۖ رَحۡمَتُ ٱللَّهِ وَبَرَكَٰتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَمِيدٞ مَّجِيدٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: they responded are you astonished by allahs decree may allahs mercy and blessings be upon you o  people of this house indeed he is praiseworthy allglorious

ayah_ar: إِنَّ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ لَحَلِيمٌ أَوَّٰهٞ مُّنِيبٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: truly abraham was forbearing tenderhearted and ever turning to his lord

ayah_ar: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي رَحِيمٞ وَدُودٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: so seek your lords forgiveness and turn to him in repentance surely my lord is most merciful allloving

ayah_ar: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
label: joy
ayah_en: staying there forever as long as the heavens and the earth will endure except what your lord wills surely your lord does what he intends

ayah_ar: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا مُصۡلِحُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and your lord o prophet would never destroy a society unjustly while its people were acting rightly

ayah_ar: وَكُلّٗا نَّقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلرُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَۚ وَجَآءَكَ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَوۡعِظَةٞ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and we relate to you o prophet the stories of the messengers to reassure your heart and there has come to you in this srah the truth a warning to the disbelievers and a reminder to the believers

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: it is they who have ruined themselves and whatever gods they fabricated will fail them

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنۡ أَسۡـَٔلَكَ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞۖ وَإِلَّا تَغۡفِرۡ لِي وَتَرۡحَمۡنِيٓ أَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: noah pleaded my lord i seek refuge in you from asking you about what i have no knowledge of and unless you forgive me and have mercy on me i will be one of the losers

ayah_ar: وَأَخَذَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and the mighty blast overtook the wrongdoers so they fell lifeless in their homes

ayah_ar: قَالَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ رُكۡنٖ شَدِيدٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: he responded if only i had the strength to resist you or could rely on a strong supporter

ayah_ar: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّمَدۡيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتۡ ثَمُودُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: as if they had never lived there so away with midian as it was with thamd

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they will have the fire as a home because of what they have committed

ayah_ar: فَذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَاذَا بَعۡدَ ٱلۡحَقِّ إِلَّا ٱلضَّلَٰلُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصۡرَفُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: that is allahyour true lord so what is beyond the truth except falsehood how can you then be turned away

ayah_ar: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يُؤۡمِنُ بِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِهِۦۚ وَرَبُّكَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: some of them will eventually believe in it others will not and your lord knows best the corruptors

ayah_ar: وَإِن كَذَّبُوكَ فَقُل لِّي عَمَلِي وَلَكُمۡ عَمَلُكُمۡۖ أَنتُم بَرِيٓـُٔونَ مِمَّآ أَعۡمَلُ وَأَنَا۠ بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: if they deny you then say my deeds are mine and your deeds are yours you are free of what i do and i am free of what you do

ayah_ar: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنۡ خَلۡفَكَ ءَايَةٗۚ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا لَغَٰفِلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: today we will preserve your corpse so that you may become an example for those who come after you and surely most people are heedless of our examples

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِي ٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَّقُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: surely in the alternation of the day and the night and in all that allah has created in the heavens and the earth there are truly signs for those mindful of him

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ فَسَقُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and so your lords decree has been proven true against the rebelliousthat they will never believe

ayah_ar: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ إِلَّا ظَنًّاۚ إِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: most of them follow nothing but inherited assumptions and surely assumptions can in no way replace the truth allah is indeed allknowing of what they do

ayah_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: they ask the believers when will this threat come to pass if what you say is true

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: then the wrongdoers will be told taste the torment of eternity are you not rewarded except for what you used to commit

ayah_ar: ۞وَيَسۡتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَۖ قُلۡ إِي وَرَبِّيٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: they ask you o prophet is this true say yes by my lord most certainly it is true and you will have no escape

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: when the truth came to them from us they said this is certainly pure magic

ayah_ar: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: and allah establishes the truth by his wordseven to the dismay of the wicked

ayah_ar: فَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ إِن كُنَّا عَنۡ عِبَادَتِكُمۡ لَغَٰفِلِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: allah is sufficient as a witness between each of us that we were totally unaware of your worship

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكُم مَّوۡعِظَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَشِفَآءٞ لِّمَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: o humanity indeed there has come to you a warning from your lord a cure for what is in the hearts a guide and a mercy for the believers

ayah_ar: قَالَ قَدۡ أُجِيبَت دَّعۡوَتُكُمَا فَٱسۡتَقِيمَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعَآنِّ سَبِيلَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: allah responded to moses and aaron your prayer is answered so be steadfast and do not follow the way of those who do not know

ayah_ar: فَلَوۡلَا كَانَتۡ قَرۡيَةٌ ءَامَنَتۡ فَنَفَعَهَآ إِيمَٰنُهَآ إِلَّا قَوۡمَ يُونُسَ لَمَّآ ءَامَنُواْ كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخِزۡيِ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَتَّعۡنَٰهُمۡ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: if only there had been a society which believed before seeing the torment and therefore benefited from its belief like the people of jonah

ayah_ar: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَيَجۡعَلُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: it is not for any soul to believe except by allahs leave and he will bring his wrath upon those who are unmindful

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ حَقًّا عَلَيۡنَا نُنجِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: then we saved our messengers and those who believed for it is our duty to save the believers

ayah_ar: ۞وَلَوۡ يُعَجِّلُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ ٱلشَّرَّ ٱسۡتِعۡجَالَهُم بِٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَقُضِيَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَجَلُهُمۡۖ فَنَذَرُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: if allah were to hasten evil for people as they wish to hasten good they would have certainly been doomed but we leave those who do not expect to meet us to wander blindly in their defiance

ayah_ar: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ إِلَّآ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَٱخۡتَلَفُواْۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِيمَا فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: humanity was once nothing but a single community of believers but then they differed their differences would have been settled at once

ayah_ar: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: surely to allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth surely allahs promise is always true but most of them do not know

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and do not be one of those who deny allahs signs or you will be one of the losers

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَأٓمَنَ مَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كُلُّهُمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُكۡرِهُ ٱلنَّاسَ حَتَّىٰ يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: had your lord so willed o prophet all people on earth would have certainly believed every single one of them would you then force people to become believers

ayah_ar: وَأَنۡ أَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and be steadfast in faith in all uprightness and do not be one of the polytheists

ayah_ar: فَسِيحُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَرۡبَعَةَ أَشۡهُرٖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّكُمۡ غَيۡرُ مُعۡجِزِي ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡزِي ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: you polytheists may travel freely through the land for four months but know that you will have no escape from allah and that allah will disgrace the disbelievers

ayah_ar: ٱشۡتَرَوۡاْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنٗا قَلِيلٗا فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they chose a fleeting gain over allahs revelations hindering others from his way evil indeed is what they have done

ayah_ar: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُطۡفِـُٔواْ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَيَأۡبَى ٱللَّهُ إِلَّآ أَن يُتِمَّ نُورَهُۥ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they wish to extinguish allahs light with their mouths but allah will only allow his light to be perfected even to the dismay of the disbelievers

ayah_ar: ۞وَلَوۡ أَرَادُواْ ٱلۡخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّواْ لَهُۥ عُدَّةٗ وَلَٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنۢبِعَاثَهُمۡ فَثَبَّطَهُمۡ وَقِيلَ ٱقۡعُدُواْ مَعَ ٱلۡقَٰعِدِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: had they really intended to march forth they would have made preparations for it but allah disliked that they should go so he let them lag behind and it was said to them stay with those helpless who remain behind

ayah_ar: وَيَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمِنكُمۡ وَمَا هُم مِّنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ يَفۡرَقُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: they swear by allah that they are part of you but they are not they only say so out of fear

ayah_ar: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ رَضُواْ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَقَالُواْ حَسۡبُنَا ٱللَّهُ سَيُؤۡتِينَا ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ رَٰغِبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: if only they had been content with what allah and his messenger had given them and said allah is sufficient for us allah will grant us out of his bounty and so will his messenger to allah alone we turn with hope

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّهُۥ مَن يُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدٗا فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخِزۡيُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
label: anger
ayah_en: do they not know that whoever opposes allah and his messenger will be in the fire of hell forever that is the ultimate disgrace

ayah_ar: يَحۡذَرُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ أَن تُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُورَةٞ تُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا فِي قُلُوبِهِمۡۚ قُلِ ٱسۡتَهۡزِءُوٓاْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡرِجٞ مَّا تَحۡذَرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: the hypocrites fear that a srah should be revealed about them exposing what is in their hearts say o prophet keep mocking allah will definitely bring to light what you fear

ayah_ar: ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتُ بَعۡضُهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡضٖۚ يَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَقۡبِضُونَ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡۚ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَنَسِيَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: the hypocrites both men and women are all alike they encourage what is evil forbid what is good and withhold what is in their hands they neglected allah so he neglected them surely the hypocrites are the rebellious

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ جَٰهِدِ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱغۡلُظۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
label: anger
ayah_en: o prophet struggle against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be firm with them hell will be their home what an evil destination

ayah_ar: فَأَعۡقَبَهُمۡ نِفَاقٗا فِي قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ بِمَآ أَخۡلَفُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا وَعَدُوهُ وَبِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡذِبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so he caused hypocrisy to plague their hearts until the day they will meet him for breaking their promise to allah and for their lies

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مَسۡجِدٗا ضِرَارٗا وَكُفۡرٗا وَتَفۡرِيقَۢا بَيۡنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَإِرۡصَادٗا لِّمَنۡ حَارَبَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُۚ وَلَيَحۡلِفُنَّ إِنۡ أَرَدۡنَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: there are also those hypocrites who set up a mosque only to cause harm promote disbelief divide the believers and as a base for those who had previously fought against allah and his messenger they will definitely swear we intended nothing but good but allah bears witness that they are surely liars

ayah_ar: أَفَمَنۡ أَسَّسَ بُنۡيَٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ تَقۡوَىٰ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٍ خَيۡرٌ أَم مَّنۡ أَسَّسَ بُنۡيَٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ شَفَا جُرُفٍ هَارٖ فَٱنۡهَارَ بِهِۦ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: which is better those who laid the foundation of their building on the fear and pleasure of allah or those who did so on the edge of a crumbling cliff that tumbled down with them into the fire of hell and allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ فَزَادَتۡهُمۡ رِجۡسًا إِلَىٰ رِجۡسِهِمۡ وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but as for those with sickness in their hearts it has increased them only in wickedness upon their wickedness and they die as disbelievers

ayah_ar: أَوَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَنَّهُمۡ يُفۡتَنُونَ فِي كُلِّ عَامٖ مَّرَّةً أَوۡ مَرَّتَيۡنِ ثُمَّ لَا يَتُوبُونَ وَلَا هُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: do they not see that they are tried once or twice every year yet they neither repent nor do they learn a lesson

ayah_ar: لَا يَرۡقُبُونَ فِي مُؤۡمِنٍ إِلّٗا وَلَا ذِمَّةٗۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: they do not honour the bonds of kinship or treaties with the believers it is they who are the transgressors

ayah_ar: فَإِن تَابُواْ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُاْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: but if they repent perform prayer and pay almstax then they are your brothers in faith this is how we make the revelations clear for people of knowledge

ayah_ar: وَيُذۡهِبۡ غَيۡظَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۗ وَيَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: removing rage from their hearts and allah pardons whoever he wills for allah is allknowing allwise

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: then afterwards allah will turn in grace to whoever he wills and allah is allforgiving most merciful

ayah_ar: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: allah has prepared for them gardens under which rivers flow to stay there forever that is the ultimate triumph

ayah_ar: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ يَقۡبَلُ ٱلتَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَأۡخُذُ ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: joy
ayah_en: do they not know that allah alone accepts the repentance of his servants and receives their charity and that allah alone is the accepter of repentance most merciful

ayah_ar: ٱلتَّٰٓئِبُونَ ٱلۡعَٰبِدُونَ ٱلۡحَٰمِدُونَ ٱلسَّٰٓئِحُونَ ٱلرَّٰكِعُونَ ٱلسَّٰجِدُونَ ٱلۡأٓمِرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَٱلنَّاهُونَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَٱلۡحَٰفِظُونَ لِحُدُودِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: it is the believers who repent who are devoted to worship who praise their lord who fast who bow down and prostrate themselves who encourage good and forbid evil and who observe the limits set by allah and give good news to the believers

ayah_ar: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُضِلَّ قَوۡمَۢا بَعۡدَ إِذۡ هَدَىٰهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُبَيِّنَ لَهُم مَّا يَتَّقُونَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: allah would never consider a people deviant after he has guided them until he makes clear to them what they must avoid surely allah has full knowledge of everything

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: o  believers be mindful of allah and be with the truthful

ayah_ar: لَا يَزَالُ بُنۡيَٰنُهُمُ ٱلَّذِي بَنَوۡاْ رِيبَةٗ فِي قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِلَّآ أَن تَقَطَّعَ قُلُوبُهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
label: sadness
ayah_en: the building which they erected will never cease to fuel hypocrisy in their hearts until their hearts are torn apart and allah is allknowing allwise

ayah_ar: وَعَلَى ٱلثَّلَٰثَةِ ٱلَّذِينَ خُلِّفُواْ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ضَاقَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتۡ وَضَاقَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَن لَّا مَلۡجَأَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّآ إِلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لِيَتُوبُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
label: sadness
ayah_en: and allah has also turned in mercy to the three who had remained behind whose guilt distressed them until the earth despite its vastness seemed to close in on them and their souls were torn in anguish they knew there was no refuge from allah except in him then he turned to them in mercy so that they might repent surely allah alone is the accepter of repentance most merciful

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
label: anger
ayah_en: this is because they defied allah and his messenger and whoever defies allah and his messenger then know that allah is surely severe in punishment

ayah_ar: ۞إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلۡبُكۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: indeed the worst of all beings in the sight of allah are the wilfully deaf and dumb who do not understand

ayah_ar: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِن يَنتَهُواْ يُغۡفَرۡ لَهُم مَّا قَدۡ سَلَفَ وَإِن يَعُودُواْ فَقَدۡ مَضَتۡ سُنَّتُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: tell the disbelievers that if they desist their past will be forgiven but if they persist then they have an example in those destroyed before them

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٍۚ إِلَّا تَفۡعَلُوهُ تَكُن فِتۡنَةٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَفَسَادٞ كَبِيرٞ
label: anger
ayah_en: as for the disbelievers they are guardians of one another and unless you believers act likewise there will be great oppression and corruption in the land

ayah_ar: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيُبۡطِلَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: to firmly establish the truth and wipe out falsehoodeven to the dismay of the wicked

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
label: fear
ayah_en: that worldly punishment is yours so taste it then the disbelievers will suffer the torment of the fire

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ زَحۡفٗا فَلَا تُوَلُّوهُمُ ٱلۡأَدۡبَارَ
label: fear
ayah_en: o believers when you face the disbelievers in battle never turn your backs to them

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَسۡمَعُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: o believers obey allah and his messenger and do not turn away from him while you hear his call

ayah_ar: وَٱتَّقُواْ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّا تُصِيبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنكُمۡ خَآصَّةٗۖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
label: fear
ayah_en: beware of a trial that will not only affect the wrongdoers among you and know that allah is severe in punishment

ayah_ar: فَإِمَّا تَثۡقَفَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡبِ فَشَرِّدۡ بِهِم مَّنۡ خَلۡفَهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: if you ever encounter them in battle make a fearsome example of them so perhaps those who would follow them may be deterred

ayah_ar: لَّوۡلَا كِتَٰبٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِيمَآ أَخَذۡتُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
label: fear
ayah_en: had it not been for a prior decree from allah you would have certainly been disciplined with a tremendous punishment for whatever ransom you have taken

ayah_ar: وَإِن يُرِيدُواْ خِيَانَتَكَ فَقَدۡ خَانُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَأَمۡكَنَ مِنۡهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
label: fear
ayah_en: but if their intention is only to betray you o prophet they sought to betray allah before but he gave you power over them and allah is allknowing allwise

ayah_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ حَقّٗاۚ لَّهُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ وَمَغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: it is they who are the true believers they will have elevated ranks forgiveness and an honourable provision from their lord

ayah_ar: وَمَا جَعَلَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بُشۡرَىٰ وَلِتَطۡمَئِنَّ بِهِۦ قُلُوبُكُمۡۚ وَمَا ٱلنَّصۡرُ إِلَّا مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
label: joy
ayah_en: and allah made this a sign of victory and reassurance to your hearts victory comes only from allah surely allah is almighty allwise

ayah_ar: إِذۡ يُوحِي رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ أَنِّي مَعَكُمۡ فَثَبِّتُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ سَأُلۡقِي فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلرُّعۡبَ فَٱضۡرِبُواْ فَوۡقَ ٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ وَٱضۡرِبُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ كُلَّ بَنَانٖ
label: joy
ayah_en: remember o  prophet when your lord revealed to the angels i am with you so make the believers stand firm i will cast horror into the hearts of the disbelievers so strike their necks and strike their fingertips

ayah_ar: وَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَنِعۡمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ
label: joy
ayah_en: and if they do not comply then know that allah is your protector what an excellent protector and what an excellent helper

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا لَقِيتُمۡ فِئَةٗ فَٱثۡبُتُواْ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: o believers when you face an enemy stand firm and remember allah often so you may triumph

ayah_ar: وَإِن يُرِيدُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡدَعُوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسۡبَكَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَبِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: but if their intention is only to deceive you then allah is certainly sufficient for you he is the one who has supported you with his help and with the believers

ayah_ar: وَأَلَّفَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۚ لَوۡ أَنفَقۡتَ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مَّآ أَلَّفۡتَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَلَّفَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: he brought their hearts together had you spent all the riches in the earth you could not have united their hearts but allah has united them indeed he is almighty allwise

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ حَسۡبُكَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: o  prophet allah is sufficient for you and for the believers who follow you

ayah_ar: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا غَنِمۡتُمۡ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
label: joy
ayah_en: now enjoy what you have taken for it is lawful and good and be mindful of allah surely allah is allforgiving most merciful

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَبِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأَقۡعُدَنَّ لَهُمۡ صِرَٰطَكَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمَ
label: anger
ayah_en: he said for leaving me to stray i will lie in ambush for them on your straight path

ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱخۡرُجۡ مِنۡهَا مَذۡءُومٗا مَّدۡحُورٗاۖ لَّمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: allah said get out of paradise you are disgraced and rejected i will certainly fill up hell with you and your followers all together

ayah_ar: قُلۡ مَنۡ حَرَّمَ زِينَةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ لِعِبَادِهِۦ وَٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ مِنَ ٱلرِّزۡقِۚ قُلۡ هِيَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا خَالِصَةٗ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: ask o prophet who has forbidden the adornments and lawful provisions allah has brought forth for his servants say they are for the enjoyment of the believers in this worldly life but they will be exclusively theirs on the day of judgment this is how we make our revelations clear for people of knowledge

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ عَنۡهَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but those who receive our revelations with denial and arrogance will be the residents of the fire they will be there forever

ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
label: anger
ayah_en: but the chiefs of his people said we surely see that you are clearly misguided

ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي سَفَاهَةٖ وَإِنَّا لَنَظُنُّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: the disbelieving chiefs of his people responded we surely see you as a fool and we certainly think you are a liar

ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: the arrogant said we surely reject what you believe in

ayah_ar: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: we poured upon them a rain of brimstone see what was the end of the wicked

ayah_ar: وَمَا وَجَدۡنَا لِأَكۡثَرِهِم مِّنۡ عَهۡدٖۖ وَإِن وَجَدۡنَآ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَفَٰسِقِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: we did not find most of them true to their covenant rather we found most of them truly rebellious

ayah_ar: فَغُلِبُواْ هُنَالِكَ وَٱنقَلَبُواْ صَٰغِرِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so pharaoh and his people were defeated right there and put to shame

ayah_ar: لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَكُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٖ ثُمَّ لَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: i will certainly cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides then crucify you all

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but as soon as we removed the torment from themuntil they met their inevitable fatethey broke their promise

ayah_ar: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَكَانُواْ عَنۡهَا غَٰفِلِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: so we inflicted punishment upon them drowning them in the sea for denying our signs and being heedless of them

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَلِقَآءِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡۚ هَلۡ يُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: the deeds of those who deny our signs and the meeting with allah in the hereafter will be in vain will they be rewarded except for what they have done

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا عَتَوۡاْ عَن مَّا نُهُواْ عَنۡهُ قُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُواْ قِرَدَةً خَٰسِـِٔينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: but when they stubbornly persisted in violation we said to them be disgraced apes

ayah_ar: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: do they associate with allah those idols which cannot create anything but are in fact created

ayah_ar: وَإِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَا يَتَّبِعُوكُمۡۚ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَدَعَوۡتُمُوهُمۡ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ صَٰمِتُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: and if you idolaters call upon them for guidance they cannot respond to you it is all the same whether you call them or remain silent

ayah_ar: كِتَٰبٌ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ فَلَا يَكُن فِي صَدۡرِكَ حَرَجٞ مِّنۡهُ لِتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: this is a book sent down to you o prophetdo not let anxiety into your heart regarding itso with it you may warn the disbelievers and as a reminder to the believers

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: he appealed then delay my end until the day of their resurrection

ayah_ar: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحۡيَوۡنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنۡهَا تُخۡرَجُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: he added there you will live there you will die and from there you will be resurrected

ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱدۡخُلُواْ فِيٓ أُمَمٖ قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ فِي ٱلنَّارِۖ كُلَّمَا دَخَلَتۡ أُمَّةٞ لَّعَنَتۡ أُخۡتَهَاۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ٱدَّارَكُواْ فِيهَا جَمِيعٗا قَالَتۡ أُخۡرَىٰهُمۡ لِأُولَىٰهُمۡ رَبَّنَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَضَلُّونَا فَـَٔاتِهِمۡ عَذَابٗا ضِعۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِۖ قَالَ لِكُلّٖ ضِعۡفٞ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تَعۡلَمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: allah will say enter the fire along with the evil groups of jinn and humans that preceded you whenever a group enters hell it will curse the preceding one until they are all gathered inside the followers will say about their leaders our lord they have misled us so multiply their torment in the fire he will answer it has already been multiplied for all but you do not know

ayah_ar: لَهُم مِّن جَهَنَّمَ مِهَادٞ وَمِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ غَوَاشٖۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: hell will be their bed flames will be their cover this is how we reward the wrongdoers

ayah_ar: ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ تَضَرُّعٗا وَخُفۡيَةًۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: call upon your lord humbly and secretly surely he does not like the transgressors

ayah_ar: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: so we saved him and his family except his wife who was one of the doomed

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ لَئِنِ ٱتَّبَعۡتُمۡ شُعَيۡبًا إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: the disbelieving chiefs of his people threatened if you follow shuaib you will surely be losers

ayah_ar: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا ضُحٗى وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: or did they feel secure that our punishment would not come upon them by day while they were at play

ayah_ar: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: who seeks to drive you from your land so pharaoh asked what do you propose

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: they responded surely to our lord we will all return

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلسِّنِينَ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed we afflicted pharaohs people with famine and shortage of crops so they might come back to their senses

ayah_ar: وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمۡ نَصۡرٗا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَنصُرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: which cannot help them or even help themselves

ayah_ar: وَإِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَا يَسۡمَعُواْۖ وَتَرَىٰهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ وَهُمۡ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: if you idolaters call them to guidance they cannot hear and you o prophet may see them facing towards you but they cannot see

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدۡ جِئۡنَٰهُم بِكِتَٰبٖ فَصَّلۡنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ هُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: we have certainly brought them a book which we explained with knowledgea guide and mercy for those who believe

ayah_ar: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنَّا وَقَطَعۡنَا دَابِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَاۖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: so we saved him and those with him by our mercy and uprooted those who denied our signs they were not believers

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُمَسِّكُونَ بِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: as for those who firmly abide by the scripture and establish prayersurely we never discount the reward of those acting righteously

ayah_ar: وَمِمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ
label: joy
ayah_en: and among those we created is a group that guides with the truth and establishes justice accordingly

ayah_ar: خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ
label: joy
ayah_en: be gracious enjoin what is right and turn away from those who act ignorantly

ayah_ar: فَمَا كَانَ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ إِذۡ جَآءَهُم بَأۡسُنَآ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: their only crywhen overwhelmed by our tormentwas we have indeed been wrongdoers

ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱهۡبِطُواْ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوّٞۖ وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُسۡتَقَرّٞ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
label: sadness
ayah_en: allah said descend as enemies to each other you will find in the earth a residence and provision for your appointed stay

ayah_ar: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٞۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَأۡخِرُونَ سَاعَةٗ وَلَا يَسۡتَقۡدِمُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: for each community there is an appointed term when their time arrives they can neither delay it for a moment nor could they advance it

ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي ضَلَٰلَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: he replied o my people i am not misguided but i am a messenger from the lord of all worlds

ayah_ar: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ
label: sadness
ayah_en: conveying to you my lords messages and i am your sincere advisor

ayah_ar: وَجَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: the magicians came to pharaoh saying shall we receive a suitable reward if we prevail

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَكُمۡ وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَنصُرُونَ
label: sadness
ayah_en: but those false gods you call besides him can neither help you nor even themselves

ayah_ar: وَمَا تَأۡتِيهِم مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: whenever a sign comes to them from their lord they turn away from it

ayah_ar: وَمَا تَأۡتِيهِم مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: whenever a sign comes to them from their lord they turn away from it

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ لَمۡ تَكُن فِتۡنَتُهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ وَٱللَّهِ رَبِّنَا مَا كُنَّا مُشۡرِكِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: their only argument will be by allah our lord we were never polytheists

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخُوضُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُواْ فِي حَدِيثٍ غَيۡرِهِۦۚ وَإِمَّا يُنسِيَنَّكَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فَلَا تَقۡعُدۡ بَعۡدَ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ مَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: anger
ayah_en: and when you come across those who ridicule our revelations do not sit with them unless they engage in a different topic should satan make you forget then once you remember do not continue to sit with the wrongdoing people

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِي بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۚ وَلَوۡ أَشۡرَكُواْ لَحَبِطَ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
label: anger
ayah_en: this is allahs guidance with which he guides whoever he wills of his servants had they associated others with him in worship their good deeds would have been wasted

ayah_ar: وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ صِدۡقٗا وَعَدۡلٗاۚ لَّا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
label: anger
ayah_en: the word of your lord has been perfected in truth and justice none can change his words and he is the allhearing all knowing

ayah_ar: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتَكُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ بَغۡتَةً أَوۡ جَهۡرَةً هَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: ask imagine if allahs punishment were to overwhelm you with or without warningwho would be destroyed other than the wrongdoers

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: but those who deny our signs will be afflicted with punishment for their rebelliousness

ayah_ar: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِتَسۡتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: this is how we make our signs clear so the way of the wicked may become distinct

ayah_ar: قُل لَّوۡ أَنَّ عِندِي مَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِهِۦ لَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: say also if what you seek to hasten were within my power the matter between us would have already been settled but allah knows the wrongdoers best

ayah_ar: وَمَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ مِنۡ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ وَلَٰكِن ذِكۡرَىٰ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: those mindful of allah will not be accountable for those who ridicule it whatsoevertheir duty is to advise so perhaps the ridiculers will abstain

ayah_ar: وَأَنۡ أَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۚ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: establish prayer and be mindful of him to him you will all be gathered together

ayah_ar: وَنُقَلِّبُ أَفۡـِٔدَتَهُمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ كَمَا لَمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهِۦٓ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖ وَنَذَرُهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: we turn their hearts and eyes away from the truth as they refused to believe at first leaving them to wander blindly in their defiance

ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ مَن يَضِلُّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦۖ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: indeed your lord knows best who has strayed from his way and who is rightly guided

ayah_ar: وَذَرُواْ ظَٰهِرَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَبَاطِنَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكۡسِبُونَ ٱلۡإِثۡمَ سَيُجۡزَوۡنَ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَقۡتَرِفُونَ
label: fear
ayah_en: shun all sinopen and secret indeed those who commit sin will be punished for what they earn

ayah_ar: وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ذُو ٱلرَّحۡمَةِۚ إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَسۡتَخۡلِفۡ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكُم مَّا يَشَآءُ كَمَآ أَنشَأَكُم مِّن ذُرِّيَّةِ قَوۡمٍ ءَاخَرِينَ
label: fear
ayah_en: your lord is the selfsufficient full of mercy if he wills he can do away with you and replace you with whoever he wills just as he produced you from the offspring of other people

ayah_ar: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَجَعَلَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ وَٱلنُّورَۖ ثُمَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ يَعۡدِلُونَ
label: joy
